The pool is well kept, there is a bar and resturant in the hotel with many dining options! The staff was kind and helpful and very welcoming. The rooms VERY clean and well appointed!! Loved it! On a final note, the hotel also offers free parking and shuttle service to the theme parks.

Reviews.Title: “Great Time; Friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: FloridaLanny
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the hotel at 10:30 at night and everything was wonderful. We checked in in no time at all. The rooms aren't as spacious as they seem but at least they were extremely clean and comfortable. The hotel conveniently supplies a laundry room which was great coz we spent almost a week there. It is situated very close to most attractions, only a 12 minute drive to Epcot and 5 min to Downtown Disney. There are many places to eat just a 5 min walk from the hotel and a large supermarket just beside which helped alot. We didn't take the shuttle to any of the attractions coz we had a rental but from what I saw they had many options for most attractions in Orlando. They just need to find a more suitable place to put the microwave and coffee maker coz they are on top of the minibar right in front of tv. All in all it was a great hotel and i highly recommend it for anyone who wants an affordable, yet relaxing vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: parkercheryl
Reviews.Content: The Radisson was everything that we expected. The front desk personnel were extremely friendly and helpful. The lobby, pool and room were very clean and spacious. I was concerned about the noise from I4 but never heard anything. Our room was on the 8th floor and faced away from the highway. The only other concern was having to uturn but that wasn't all that bad either. Overall, great hotel and so glad that we stayed there. Would love to stay again when able.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!!”
Reviews.Author: Yaadcritic
Reviews.Content: We used our Carlson points and booked a hotel that had adjoining rooms for five kids and two adults. When we got to that hotel, we had to run out of there because it was filthy. We ended up at the Raddison for the remainder of the stay, and we were HAPPY! The hotel has: GREAT STAFF CLEAN AND FRESH ROOMS GREAT RESTAURANT IN THE LOBBY A GREAT EXPERIENCE!! I have nothing negative thing to say about this hotel. It was simply a GREAT HOTEL!

Reviews.Title: “Fantasic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alvin B
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 13 nights at the Radisson Hotel Lake Buena Vista ( july 24th - august 6th) to visit the Disney parks. After months of searching the internet I chose this hotel and I must say that I was not disappointed. My family ( my wife and two children 8 and 4 ) enjoyed every day of our stay. From the moment you enter the hotel you can smell how clean the hotel is. The rooms are large and very very clean. We had no problems using the shuttles to the parks.Thank you Raddisson for a wonderfull stay ! We'll be back !

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed our stay and we'll be back.”
Reviews.Author: msanniota
Reviews.Content: The Family suite was more than accomodating. It looked just like the picture showed. The hotel was very clean and the staff was hospitable. The beds were also very comfortable. The location is convenient; it's close to everything. We would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel!”
Reviews.Author: gatorRPH1990
Reviews.Content: This was a really nice hotel just across the street from the Disney entrance. Our room was very clean and luxurious. Front desk staff was extremely friendly. I'm not crazy about the sleep number beds , but otherwise we really liked the room and the AAA rate was very good.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for great value!”
Reviews.Author: ErikS77
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 12 nights, and it was very happy with our stay. Great rooms, and very good location regarding the large parks. Recommend this hotel to both families and couples.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have been happier!”
Reviews.Author: hadaga75
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here while visiting the Disney World parks this month. My husband and I couldn't have been happier with the hotel we chose! We got a superior room at a great rate thanks to the Facebook friends promotion. I saw that this hotel was rated number 7 of 300+ hotels in Orlando so I was rather anxious to get there. When we arrived, we tried to check in early. While we could have checked in, the front desk was very courteous and told us they had a room available but they would rather not put us in it due to our long stay and the room being close to the elevator. They wanted to ensure our stay was pleasant. We agreed to come back in an hour or so as they recommended and took care of some other errands while we had the time. When we returned, they had a room ready for us. When we walked into the room, I couldn't stop smiling. My husband and I walked around the room to inspect it as we do at all hotels we stay at. We both were very pleased with EVERYTHING! The beds were great! Neither of us had slept in a sleep number bed before so it was an added bonus for us. We had our two daughters with us and planned for them to sleep with each of us on the queen sized beds. To our surprise, the sofa had a twin sized pull out bed! My five year old was so excited to have a bed all to herself! It was nice for my husband and I as well because we took turns sleeping with out one year old. It's not often we get a whole bed to ourselves these days. :) The room was clean, so clean that neither my husband or I felt any hesitation walking around barefoot! I must say, the bath soap was one of my favorite amenities. The free wifi was also great! We've found that in larger hotels, utilizing free wifi can be a pain but it was so easy here, and fast! Unfortunately, our stay was cut short due to some last minute change of plans. We ended up staying at another hotel in Florida that wasn't nearly as impressive. The only downfall to our stay here was the free shuttle to Disney World. In our room, there was a schedule for the shuttle with some information regarding what is and isn't authorized on the bus. On this information sheet, we were told strollers were not authorized on the shuttle. Call me crazy, but a great number of Disney World visitors have and bring their children to the parks! To not allow strollers is a bit absurd. Sure, strollers are available for rent at the Disney World parks, but as a parent it makes no sense to rent a stroller when I have my own. I know this isn't the hotel's fault but it would make sense to offer a complimentary service that the guests could utilize. Otherwise, very pleased with the hotel and would absolutely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, wouldn't stay anywhere else.”
Reviews.Author: gabbyflower
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very nice! The staff was wonderful and very helpful. The rooms were very clean and nice. They even smelled good..not like the usual hotel smell. My duaghter bought and brought a lot of toys with her and left them all over the place, when we came back to our room that evening the cleaning lady arranged her toys on bed and it was so cute. Courtesy Shuttles to Disney Theme parks. Make sure you are on time! Shuttles run on a schedule and will not wait. So make sure everyone in your party is there at the same time. The plus to this is, when you are returning from an entire day at Disney and want to come back the shuttle is there on time!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Thewhites2011
Reviews.Content: One of the friendliest hotels we have ever stayed in. The front desk staff are fabulous. Luke the head barman is the best. The rooms are spacious and clean. The wi-fi could do with improving. Free parking which is a bonus. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great price, great time”
Reviews.Author: diane31957
Reviews.Content: Spent the Fourth of July here and a few days before and after. Received a great Florida resident price even for a holiday weekend. Room included two free breakfast buffets every day. Great savings. Hotel and rooms were clean, comfortable and sleep number beds were great. Cookies every night at the desk. Close to everything. Plan on retuning in future

Reviews.Title: “Disney Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: guzbon
Reviews.Content: This hotel stay was more than we expected. The hotel is very clean in every aspect. The staff was very friendly from the time we walked in the doors of the hotel until it was time to checkout. The hotel room beds are sleep number bed. Awesome! We were able to control our sides of the bed and slept comfortably. Thank you! The hotel location is very close to the Disney parks (about 5-10 minutes away). The housekeeping staff kept the hotel room very clean (Thank you Catalina). The hotel pool is a family friendly environment. We recommend this hotel. You will not be disappointed. We will be back. Thank you, Flor & Maria Guzman.

Reviews.Title: “A+++ Would Hotel With Again!”
Reviews.Author: AmyRu
Reviews.Content: The Radisson Lake Buena Vista is a great hotel, located in the LBV region outside of Orlando. Before booking the hotel, you should realize what the LBV area is like: Lots of other hotels. The Radisson LBV is right off the I-4 with access to downtown Disney in less than 10 minutes. With that being said, here are the pros, cons, and tips I can suggest from staying here: PROS - The hotel is clean and affordable: Almost unbelievable, but this hotel is both clean and cheap! We paid around $70/night for rooms during peak season. The bathrooms are clean, and the housekeeping staff kept the rooms fresh every night. The hotel also offers a pool (the pictures make it seem bigger than it is) and a small exercise room with one or two treadmills. The staff was friendly, helped out with every need, and were part of the reason our stay was almost magical! - Free shuttle to Disney: The hotel offers a shuttle to Disney. If this is your first time using a shuttle to Disney, realize that the bus route from hotels usually don't go directly to the parks. Shuttles stop at other hotels along the way, usually leaving the Radisson the 2nd or 3rd hotel out of 3 on the chain. Give yourself plenty of time to take the shuttle (at least a hour). The shuttles coming back from the park are usually full. Be sure to follow the hotel instructions and be at the stop 10 minutes before the bus is scheduled to leave. And don't worry... there is more than enough time to see the fireworks at Epcot and MK and get back to the bus.. even with the crowds! - Location: Although LBV is in the heart of a tourist area, the hotel is next to a ton of places to eat. If you walk 5 minutes from the hotel down Apopka Vineland Road, you can be at a McDonalds, Buffalo Wild Wings, Taco Bell, Pizzeria UNO, and a supermarket called "Goodings". There are a variety of other places in the shopping center behind the hotel (Perkins, Sony store, etc.). Make use of them! CONS: - Hotel Shuttle: Be aware that the shuttle does NOT leave the hotel after 12 noon. This isn't really a con, but be aware of the shuttle system. If you want to come back to the hotel, you might need to fork some cash for a taxi. TIPS: - Taxi: Taxi to the airport is around $60 (with tip) RT. - If you need to come back from Disney earlier than the scheduled shuttle times, take a taxi! HOWEVER, a taxi from MK or EPCOT will probably run you around $25 one-way. To save, take a Disney bus to downtown Disney (all transportation on Disney property is free). A taxi from Downtown Disney to the Radisson will run you less than $10 in peak hour. - If you feel you've ever been cheated by a taxi, make sure you note the taxi #! You can call the company and get re-reimbursed if you feel you weren't charged correctly! - Feel free to ask the front desk for an ethernet wire if you need one for your computer! They will definitely provide you with one! Overall, I feel that the Radisson was the best deal you can get outside of Disney properties with the greatest convenience possible! I would surely use this hotel again if I come back to the Orlando area!

Reviews.Title: “Well Worth the Money”
Reviews.Author: lbug0220
Reviews.Content: After researching many hotels in the area, we believed Radisson gave us the best deal. We were right! The hotel was very clean, the desk clerk were very receptive and helpful, and most importantly, the rooms were large and clean. Not to mention, the hotel is close to everything, i.e., restaurants, parks, shopping, etc. We could not have asked for more for the price we paid. Trust my review. I am a seasoned traveler and know what is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed. We had money stolen!”
Reviews.Author: mailbox755
Reviews.Content: That´s not a bad hotel, but be stolen is not something I can easily get trough. The manager was very kind, but at the end, the money was gonne...

Reviews.Title: “Just at the door of Disney World”
Reviews.Author: milocruz
Reviews.Content: Nice,clean with a great location!! With shuttles to parks!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Value, Great Location and Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: tddubai
Reviews.Content: On recommendation from a work colleague pre-paid for 10 nights to take a family of 4 (16 and 13) to enjoy the many Orlando attractions. I was not disappointed with the location which is very convenient for Disney Downtown, Disney Parks, Seaworld, Universal and even a trip to Busch Gardens. I rented a car from the airport and did not find it difficult to exit and enter the hotel or for that matter traverse the road to get on to the interstate. The immediate area caters to tourists and is full of different places to eat in the evening. There is a high standard of service at this hotel, the rooms are clean and spacious and accommodate a family comfortably. We enjoyed the sleep number beds, free wifi, fridge and coffee making equipment. The house keeping staff, concierge, reception and the general manager were very helpful and supportive. I had one issue, on our return from a waterpark we noted a crack in the bathroom basin. I reported this to the front desk and they sent a maintenance man immediately to appraise the issue. I assumed it was an accident from housekeeping earlier in the day. The general manager was prepared to move us to another room but it was our last night and we stayed. Overall I was very impressed, not simply with the facilities which are great but with the positive and helpful attitude of the staff. I would certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “perfect location and great rooms”
Reviews.Author: neptuneJeddah
Reviews.Content: the hotel location is perfect , near to most attractions , but fare from the universal studios and sea world , not to mention the traffic when going to these places is long. As for the rooms i really liked how large the space, and the jacuzzi was perfect specially after a long day out.

Reviews.Title: “all we need”
Reviews.Author: evamx81
Reviews.Content: This hotel is wonderful, we chose for the reviews on TripAdvisor, check in was very fast, very clean rooms every day, we went to the park disney and it was nice to come back and have a clean room and a comfortable bed, children were very happy and I liked the most was the detail that had the day that my son's birthday, when we returned to the hotel tired and wet we found a cake, balloons, a cup with a card and sticker for my child who was of the most excited, highly recommended for the price and location, the only thing that was not to my liking was the schedule of the buses going to the parks, luckily found a cheap service that made us work, the hotel staff all very friendly and the pool clean and closing later, great service, if I go back to orlando this will be my choice. Este hotel es maravilloso, nosotros lo escogimos por las criticas en tripadvisor, el check in fue muy rapido, los cuartos muy limpios todos los dias, fuimos a los parkes disney y era agradable regresar y tener un cuarto limpio y unas comodas camas, los ninos estuvieron muy contentos y lo que me gusto mas fue el detalle que tuvieron el dia que mi hijo cumplio anos, cuando regresamos al hotel cansados y mojados encontramos un pastel, globos, un vasito y sticker con una tarjeta para mi nino quien estuvo de los mas emocionado, altamente recomendado por el precio y la ubicacion, lo unico que no fue de mi agrado fue el horario de los autobuses que iban a los parques, afortunadamente encontramos un servicio barato que nos hizo el trabajo, el personal del hotel todos muy amables y la alberca limpia y la cerraban tarde, genial servicio, si vuelvo a ir a orlando esta sera mi eleccion

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Florida2UK
Reviews.Content: We loved it here. Pros: Adjustable beds were great. Each person can choose how they want there side of the bed to be. I'd reccomend starting at 100 and then moving downward The cleaning staff did a great job each day and filled the soap and shampoo every day. It was clean and the room was a good size with a couch at the end. The Fridge and counter space were a good size. We were able to get some things from Wal mart down the street for breakfast and evening to save a bit of money. I didn't notice any noise. We were the side of the highway. The wash machine was a good size, quick and easy to use The location was close to everything including places to eat etc. It was a piece of cake to get to Disney. They do have a shuttle but we just drove. The staff were very helpful Cons: ( very minor ones) Although a good location, the traffic is really bad on Friday's and Saturdays . If you want to go to the outlet malls down the road I'd recommend coming home another way other than Apooka Vineland Road. Breakfast isn't included in the price were as if you went to a Hampton Inn or Holiday Inn it would be. The pool isn't heated and in March the water was really cold.

Reviews.Title: “A warm and always reliable staff”
Reviews.Author: Claudiotto
Reviews.Content: I stayed several times at the Radisson Orlando Lake Buena Vista, as it's in a quite good position, but over all, for its really exceptionally warm and reliable staff. All persons working at the hotel say a nice word to you, and whenever I asked them for something, they immediately react. It's not so frequent to find people in the Orlando hotels that LISTEN your words; often you find people that hear something but they go ahead their mind anyway... The hotel is in very good conditions, the rooms are clean and pretty large. Bathrooms are clean ad plenty of gadgets and welcome kits. Water is always available for free in the firdge. Internet connection is (always free) available either via wi-fi than via LAN cable (supplied on request). I can't evaluate the bar and restaurant as well, 'cause I've never ate there. The swimming pool is a bit small and placed in a bit noisy environment (the hotel is strategically locates at the I-4 and Apopka Vineland road), but you can anyway relax yourself at the sun of Florida. I definitively suggest to stay at this hotel; believe me, I stayed so many times at Orlando as I'm a NASA partner, and I judge this as one of the most pleasant places to stay there. Please, accept my apologies for my bad command of English.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Mostuna
Reviews.Content: Family of 5, 2 adults and 2 teenagers and one kid. No problem to stay all in one room. The hotel had a great location, nearby to all parks, Disney, Universial, Sea World etc. Very friendly staff. Expecially at the front desk:-) Very helpful and nice! The hotel was clean and the room was modern and had good space. The bathroom could had been a little bigger, but it was no big problem. Supermarket and restaurants were within walking distance. The rate was great too. Complimentary parking, internet and shuttle to the parks. OK outdoor pool and sunbeds. Would definitly stay there again if we are going back to Orlando. Satisfied family from Ørsta, Norway.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, great rooms and service”
Reviews.Author: nikidancer
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 4 nights to see the last shuttle launch in July. We chose this location because of the proximity to the pick up spot of the tour group we were using. We were pleasantly surprised with this hotel. The staff was friendly and helpful, the rooms were clean, comfortable and quite large. There were many restaurants in the area within walking distance. A staff member was available to give recommendations on places to eat and even gave coupons to places you thought you would enjoy. The hotel is also conveniently located to the Disney parks. It was only a 10 minute drive to Downtown Disney and each of the 4 parks. It only took about 15 mins to drive to Universal as well. The hotel does provide shuttle transportation for free to all of the parks, but we did not use that service so I cannot comment about it. The traffic of 535 can be horrendous in the evening as everyone leaves the parks and I'm surprised we did not end up getting rear-ended but it's to expect when so many people are visiting the parks. My only complaint for this hotel is regarding the sleep number beds. They did not stay at the selected number and during the night the opposite side of the bed became rock hard. We had 2 queen beds so we slept separately because we did not have enough time in our busy schedule to contact the desk and complain. However, as friendly and cooperative as they seemed, I'm sure the front desk would have been very helpful with this issue. Overall, this hotel is a wonderful place to stay: Clean, helpful staff, convenient, quiet. I recommend staying here to anyone staying in Orlando/Lake Buena Vista for a Disney trip or Orlando stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: frenchinar479
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very nice! Clean rooms, stylish, great value for your money. No hidden fees. Free parking, free wireless, and no resort fee. We've been coming here for our summer vacation 3 years in a row now. Kids live the big pool and your minutes from Disney. We will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Peace of Mind”
Reviews.Author: Guest039
Reviews.Content: If you are in search of peace of mind during your travel, i suggest you look in this conveniently located hotel in Orlando, FL. In addition to convenience, this hotel offers a team of professionals who are dedicated to customer service, cleanliness, and making sure their guests have the best possible experience during their stay in their hotel. Thanks, Traveler

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean hotel, comfy beds”
Reviews.Author: Katigurl32
Reviews.Content: We loved the Sleep Number beds. Room was nice and clean. Very close to Disney and I4. The only downside was the traffic near the hotel was terrible. It was to get in and out of the hotel, and a quick run to the store turned into a long ordeal. Other than the traffic, the hotel was great.

Reviews.Title: “Mycket Bra! Very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: Kukkopilli
Reviews.Content: Loved this hotel, good service and friendly staff, location ok and clean rooms, special thanks too the staff at the parks ticket desk. The Valentin family!

Reviews.Title: “A good and friendly hotel in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: DelhiGlobeTrotter
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Radisson Lake Buena Vista during our vacations to Disneyland Orlando. We stayed at this hotel for 10 days from 20-26May, then from 29May-2June 2011. Radisson LBV is a comfortable hotel. The rooms seem much bigger and spacious in the pictures than they actually are but they are comfortable. The staff is very friendly which is the best part of this hotel. They try and cooperate with you in every manner and cater to all your needs. There is a 24 hours supermarket within walking distance from the hotel where you can get everything for your fooding and day to day needs. The sleepnumber beds at the hotel were very comfortable and must say we needed them after a full days excursion at the Disney parks after which you barely have any energy left and just feel like falling dead on your bed. The hotel also provides complimentary shuttle to the disney parks and universal studios which we used. They were bang on time and also comfortable. So saved on my taxi fares there as well.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Riaz65
Reviews.Content: The Radisson Hotel Lake Buena Vista is a really nice hotel. Clean, reasonable price and convenient to Disney. The Staff is extremely friendly and helpful, the hotel is clean and the rooms is adequate for the price paid. If you cannot stay at a Disney property then i highly recommend the Radisson.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel !”
Reviews.Author: DublinKaren
Reviews.Content: Our two teenagers loved this hotel. There were lots of places to eat near by and their favourite restaurant Bahama Breeze was five minutes away. The pool was small but really lovely and the staff was so helpful and nice especially, Luke the barman who was very helpful with lots of tips. The beds were really comfortable and the rooms were big and spacious. I loved the free cookies each evening. Oh and they make the best Pina Colada too. I would love to go back again!

Reviews.Title: “Third Stay here, happy again”
Reviews.Author: LLTG
Reviews.Content: THis used to be the #1 on Trip Advisor, not sure how it got to #8 - it is in a perfect location for Disney area with lots of restaurants etc. Clean, hotel staff is very nice/accomodating. Food in restaurant is good etc. The noise from traffic when you are at the pool has been taken care of with music from the outside speakers *could definately do without the techno music though, something a little more tropical/relaxing would be nice. Traffic is plentiful but that is what you get when you come to a destination spot. We will definately stay here again in the future without question. I am not sure if the Sleep Number bed is an option or if they are in every room but I think if given the choice, I will skip those next time, I could never seem to get my number right and we were there a week.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: janefrommd
Reviews.Content: Staying here was a great experience. The staff was wonderful and very responsive. The room was beautful and perfectly maintained. We had already made reservations to stay in a Disney hotel for the balance of our week in Orlando so we were only at the Radisson for one night but the next time we are in Orlando we will stay here instead. The hotel was much nicer and less expensive than the Disney property.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we will stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: addywaddy
Reviews.Content: It's the best service we have received at a Radisson Hotel. Great rooms, spacious, comfortable, and clean. The hotel felt new with warm and friendly reception. A great smaller hotel (not like the giant Rosen hotel near the convention centre). Free parking close to the entrances of the hotel. Complimentary wi-fi and free use of the computer in the hotel lobby. The front and back entrance made for very convenient coming and going. Close to Disney Downtown, numerous restaurant choices closeby, and across the highway to the outlet shopping. Really, an ideal location. I would return to this hotel when we visit Orlando again.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Choice!”
Reviews.Author: FLRedrobin
Reviews.Content: I always read your reviews and I can say this one was right on. The hotel was priced right, the front desk was extremely nice, the lobby and restaraunt were very nice and most importantly the room was great! Very clean, nicely furnished with beautiful linens. The Air Comfort beds were OK, our first experience on them. The hotel was quiet and very handy to several decent restaraunts, within walking distance! Plus, you pull out of the parking lot and the first light is onto Buena Vista Drive which takes you to all the Disney sites! We will stay there again! Only drawback was no turn into hotel coming from Buena Vista Dr., had to drive past hotel, make a U-turn and then back to hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wejoy
Reviews.Content: The hotel is great, if you don't mind being right by the freeway. The rooms are clean, the staff is nice. Over all the hotel is very nice. I just don't understand why they would have there nicer rooms facing the freeway. We had a King room and moved to a room with two queen beds that faced the parking lot. Much better. The price was great.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location and Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Bea1967
Reviews.Content: We loved staying at this hotel from the start. I was slightly put off initially by the location reviews but did not think we were right on on the freeway - instead we found a fairly luxurious hotel with all amenities and excellent staff. They helped us find a car rental company when their own one had 'run out of cars due to a busy morning'. Breakfast was good, two could 'unofficially' eat from the buffet menu without any eyevbrows raised. The room was very clean and the Number mattress ensured that everyone could have a good night's sleep. One of us even claimed to never have slept better! Hotel is near Disney facilities and the Premier Outlet Shopping Mall (just a short complimentary bus ride or drive away). There are a wide range of restaurants just behind the hotel, which can easily be accessed by car or walk, if you are mad, as we were, as it is nearly impossible to cross any roads whatsoever. Very happy to have stayed and would definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Saeesh
Reviews.Content: This is one of the better hotels I have stayed in. The hotel is located about 30 minute drive from Orlando airport. Catch the Mears Shuttle to the hotel. Round trip for 3 persons cost me around 102 USD. The check in process was smooth. The room category I had booked was not ready, but since we were in a hurry to hit the Disney Parks, the lady at the reception was kind enough to give me another category room at the same price. The Disney parks are about 15-20 minutes drive from the hotel. Universal Studios was a little far, maybe 30 minutes. The hotel has a free shuttle but the timings are not always convenient. The room was quite big and was very modern. The best part of the hotel is the location with many restaurants and eating places within walking distance. We stayed for 3 days and every day we had breakfast at the Waffle House just next to the hotel. Please be careful when you talk to the counter next to the reception for Disney Park tickets. They have good deals and discounts but these are attached to spending 1 hour listening to a time share presentation. I had booked the hotel through Hotel.com and I thought the money I paid was well spent. would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jestupinan
Reviews.Content: This is by far one of the best hotels I have ever stay. In the last 5 years I have stayed in no less than 20 different hotels around America due to my job. Most of them 5star hotels. I picked up this hotels based on the reviews from trip advisor. Believe me, thisq is the right choice if you are planning a trip to Orlando, whether with your couple qor your family. Why? For me the best thing this hotel has is the front desk, they were so helpful in every aspect of my stay. The manager is such a nice person and I remember him one morning walking around the hotel to be sure everything was perfect (I don't see this very often). Location of the hotel couldn't be the best. Is close to Disney and 10 minutes from Universal. There are two outlets just as near as 2 minutes distance. All in all, I would greatly recommend this hotel for the excelent service, great location and a great price. By the way....they have a very nice wireless internet connection. Just take your Ipad with you and plan your activities at night

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Nice, Clean, and perfect location”
Reviews.Author: fishhead101
Reviews.Content: This was one excellent hotel. The staff was beyond friendly, they offered help at every point we had any contact with them. The hotel was extremely clean. We stayed there as a group and not one individual had any issues for the entire week. The pool was in great shape with a tiki hut right next to it for the quick beverage. Parking was quick, easy and just blocks from the Disney Market Place entrance and several restaurants within walking distance. This was an excellent hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Trip, We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: krsheppard
Reviews.Content: Book this hotel for Church Group Trip of 45 people. We loved it. Rooms were very nice and location is great. We'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing Special”
Reviews.Author: Billyz11
Reviews.Content: Requested a quiet room, high floor at check in, allocated 5th floor next to the service elevator.(just too tired to be bothered moving) Stupid sleep number beds too short for a six footer. Went out at 11am, returned 5pm, room had not been serviced....when I called to complain was told 'sorry we were sold out last night and it's taking some time to service all the rooms'...pathetic. Flat screen TV made a loud whirring sound and picture kept blanking. Free wireless internet was quick and reliable. Very basic bathroom.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect base for trips to Disney - but a bit noisy”
Reviews.Author: Castello73
Reviews.Content: Perfect if you plan to go to Disney: take the first left on 515N approx. 150m north of the hotel and you're on Hotel Plaza Blvd and thus inside the Disney resort. From there it's only 10-15' easy driving to most Disney parks without having to hit any traffic - perfect. Cannot recommend taking the shuttle to Disney as it serves several locations and does not drive very often - if you want flexibility you better go by car and pay Disney the $14. Staff and rooms at hotel - we stayed in a family suite - were perfect, but with lots of noise from highway 515 and the parking lot. Bathrooms were a bit small for a suite too.

Reviews.Title: “What a find!”
Reviews.Author: Forkhandels1
Reviews.Content: This for me was a great find ,our party was travelling around Florida for a month and stayed at lots of hotels along the way . This is one of the better ones And we payed $89 .We wanted to spend a few days doing Disney and this is just down the way.The hotel staff were great and very helpful ,the bar staff were fun a ready with a drink when we needed one ! Kids loved the cookies on the reception . Some people complain about the turn into the hotel especially having to swing around depending on which direction you come in from, but it didn't bother us we managed no problems. Pool was fab small but perfect after a long day and never got too busy . Would defininetly stay again .

Reviews.Title: “awesome”
Reviews.Author: suz5113
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night for our honeymoon. The beds were comfortable, food was good, it was very clean. We loved it. They even put a little gift bag in the room with a card. I will be back!

Reviews.Title: “A solid performer”
Reviews.Author: 4ft10in
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 7 nights and had a good time. The rooms are large and comfortable although the bathrooms are a little dated. As noted in earlier reviews the wifi is a bit hit and miss. We were often unable to connect or the connection dropped out mid session. It is about a 25 dollar taxi ride to Magic Kingdom and 10 dollars to Downtown Disney. An important benefit is the numerous restaurants and a 24 hr supermarket right next door. If I had a gripe it would be a minor one with the poolside tiki bar. The bartender was a youngish guy who spent most of the time on his cellphone and was not very helpful. Otherwise very happy.

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: place-name-here
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a good substitute for wanting to be close to Disney world without staying in one of their hotels. The location was close to many different restaurants and literally the next turn was the entrance to the Disney world mecca (but be warned its along drive to each of the parks). Upon entering the hotel lobby it was nothing spectacular but who cares when majority of the day will be spent in the parks. There's a tiny bar on the left side and their own restaurant. Fresh baked cookies reside next to the front desk which i thought was a nice touch for the kiddies or in my case a sugar addicted boyfriend. The room was clean and a good size; there was a love seat in the corner and a writing desk. The bed was big, clean and comfortable. The bathroom looked to be renovated recently but it could have been due to the well maintenance of the place. The shower was clean but the hotel skimped on the shower curtain, i found the water to spill onto the floor after i finished my shower. I appreciated the closet being a mirror since I find most hotels do not have a full length mirror. The hotel claims to have free wi-fi but its a gamble to log on and if you are successful its the slowest connection ever, but this was just a minor thing. Cleanliness and location are the most important things on my list, if i say something is clean it means its clean since I border on being too clean. I recommend the traveler rent a car if they plan to visit multiple parks. While i did not use their shuttle i heard its a bit of a hassle.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: wannabetravler42041
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights to go to Disney World. The locations was great. There were tons of restaurants right behind the hotel and a grocery store. It was also a 15 min walk to Downtown Disney. The shuttle was always on time that took you to certain Disney locations. The breakfast in the restaurant was not very good. The rooms were nice and clean. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Uncle-Axl
Reviews.Content: Stayed in September 2010. Great hotel, nice rooms with comfy beds - could not get the safe to work but I think that was more "user error" on my part than everything else. One minor quibble was the car park, it seemed on the small size espically for someone with a larger car. I am actually planning on returning again in September this year :)

Reviews.Title: “We absolutely LOVED it and will most definitely be back”
Reviews.Author: debkit
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on Tripadvisor and made my decision based on the reviews. The hotel staff could not have been nicer. Close to Disney and other attractions. They offer complimentary shuttle service to and from the park. With a car you have a bit more freedom to do what you want.

Reviews.Title: “There is no other place to stay in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: parabegel
Reviews.Content: I live in Florida and am a frequent visitor to Orlando. I happened upon this Radisson when it opened a couple of years ago. We were staying at a chain hotel on International Drive. Many of the hotels on International Drive are starting to really show their age. That was the problems with our choice. We checked into this Radisson and I don't even consider any other place. This is an above average hotel with above average amenities for the price. Sleep Number beds, flat screen TV's, cushy cushions on the poolside furniture just to name a few. Everything just sparkes. If you want to make a reservation, call or email Ila Patel, and tell her that "Lynn" sent you! She will hook you up with a great room with a great rate! This review is the subjective opinion of a TripAdvisor member and not of TripAdvisor LLC.

Reviews.Title: “good clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: tazntom
Reviews.Content: My wife and I took a trip to orlando over memorial day weekend. We stayed at the Radisson Lake Buena Vista and had room 303 I state the room # because we had no noise at all from the elevators or the ice machine. Our room was clean and well furnished. There is a restaurant on site which we did not use. I thought the price was high until I went to neighboring restaurants ( i guess i'm just a frugal getting old type of guy). The rooms have coffee makers and they also sell Starbucks coffee in the lobby in the morning. One small item of demerit was that the pool furniture is showing it's age and a few lounge chairs were torn at the seams. Over all a well located hotel with good service (oh, My T.V. froze on Saturady night at about 12:30 am and maintenance was there in 10 minutes to reset it.) Clean pool clean gym clean room. What a pleasure . They have sleep number beds and they were good but I think I'm a matress type of guy.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome rooms”
Reviews.Author: latnballer
Reviews.Content: Stayed here one night during Memorial Day Weekend. It was a last minute booking on a busy weekend and the price was reasonable compared to others in the same area. My first option would have been a Disney resort but they were sold out or extremely over priced. This one was just perfect, right at the entrance to the Walt Disney World resort. I booked it due to it being rated #10 out of hundreds in Orlando. Traffic was a little heavy in the areas around the hotel but it wasn't too bad at times. The check-in went well, staff was friendly. The rooms were awesome. Updated, clean, spacious and relaxing. We tried the buffet breakfast at the restaurant on the morning of our checkout but it left a lot to be desired. Servers were friendly but seemed inexperienced. Food was ok but should have been better for the price. Other than that, I recommend this hotel to those that don't want to stay at a Disney resort yet be close enough to the attractions. The room was cleaner than the ones I've seen at Disney resorts, value and moderate. A 10min walk from Downtown Disney or the Outlet Mall. Plenty of restaurants to choose from in the area...just don't eat at the one in the hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Believe the positive reviews, they are true!”
Reviews.Author: BoBoMaMa
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 6 days during the Easter week and was very impressed with this hotel. I have to admit the main reason for selecting this hotel was from the positive reviews and was grateful that everything turned out to be true. The room was spacious, the beds were very comfortable and the location was excellent. The staff was also very friendly and helpful. We rented a car so it was extremely quick and easy getting to the parks, outlets, nearby restaurants and 24 hour supermarket just next to the hotel. The only one thing that would make my stay even better would be the lighting. The hotel uses cold white light bulbs which makes the lighting very white and cool, like a clinic, I think it would look more relaxing and cozy if they switch to the warm white light bulbs instead. We also followed comments made by another writer and searched for the gas station which sells discount park tickets. It was the 7 eleven gas station which is the third gas station after turning right from the hotel, actually; a block away. However, please be mindful you have to go to another hotel to pick up the tickets (about 15 min drive) and go through a 90 min time sharing seminar for the discount tickets. We ended up not getting the discount tickets afterall. In summary, we had a very pleasant stay at the hotel and will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing but GREAT things to say”
Reviews.Author: camrensmom
Reviews.Content: Ok so let me tell you my orginal plan was to stay on downtown disney property, however I changed my mind due to some customer service issues. And boy oh boy AM I GLAD!!!!!!! When we arrived, we were able to check in early. Our frig & safe had a problem, by the time we informed someone, it was already taken care of. The rooms were spacious and the sleep number beds were WONDERFUL!!!! The location wasn't bad either like some of the other reviews say. Ok so yes you have to do a u-turn at the next light, but it is so worth being in the location you're in. My son turned 4 while we were here, so I ordered cake & balloons. When I went to check out, the manager greeted me & asked how my son liked everything (she had done the shopping & added a cars booklet). Then she informed me that it was all paid. Brought a tear to my eye. Where do you get service like that anymore? Thank you so much for an out of this world stay. We will definately be back!

Reviews.Title: “Can't believe some of the bad reviews!!!”
Reviews.Author: millimouse
Reviews.Content: It is nearly 12 months ago since my stay but after reading some (in my opinion unjustified reviews) rating the hotel badly I felt I owed the hotel a good review after having had a wonderful stay. This hotel thoroughly deserves to be rated highly and should in my opinion be in the top 5 best hotels. Upon our arrival we were greeted in a warm and friendly manner. We upgraded to a spa suite which was fabulous. We had one or two minor glitches such as the shower rim leaking and a faulty coffee making machine however, after contacting reception both was sorted within the hour. The room was kept spotlessly clean throughout our entire stay! We ate in the restaurant a couple of nights during our stay and the food was lovely and the staff very attentive and friendly. Also, the bar staff were very welcoming and friendly and we enjoyed a few evenings chatting at the bar. The location was great for DTD and it was a lovely stroll to the Crossroads area. The issue of the hotel being on the busy road with no direct access when on the opposite side from the hotel did not pose us any problems whatsoever. You just travel a little further to were you can do a uturn. We never felt this was a problem at all. I certainly would not let that be issue to not booking at this hotel. I don't normally write reviews so am not really sure what else to say apart from our room was facing the road and we were never disturbed by noise from the traffic. I would highly recommend spending a little extra and getting a spa room it was fabulous and just what was needed after a busy day at the parks. Thank you to all staff at the Radisson Hotel Orlando-Lake Buena Vista for a fabulous 14 nights!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful find, super convenient”
Reviews.Author: KMcDavid
Reviews.Content: Where to begin? The Radisson LBV exceeds expectations on all fronts. Wonderful staff who bend over backwards to meet your every need, extremely spacious rooms with sleep number beds, microwave, mini fridge (at least in the business section) sofa, good sound proofing between rooms, and everything was very clean. You can't beat the location either, if Disney is your thing, which I'm assuming it is. It's situated next to the Crossroads retail and dining complex on Apopka Vineland, as well as a 24 hr grocery store which came in extremely handy for our day trips to Disney and late night/early morning snackage in the hotel room. You can also walk to the Premium Outlets (bit of a hike, 20-25 minute walk), and it's a quick cab ride to and from Orlando International Airport, as well as the Mall at Millenia. Free, daily shuttles will get you to any of the Disney parks, and though they buses can get pretty crowded, the Radisson is the first stop so you're guaranteed a seat (bus stops at nearby Clarion property on its way to parks). The returning shuttle to the hotel from the parks leaves fairly late in evening, and if you wanted to return earlier in the day, if you're in even roughly decent shape, getting back to the hotel at night is a breeze. Simply take the unbelievably efficient Disney buses to Downtown Disney. From there, it's a leisurely fifteen minute walk down hotel row to Apopka Vineland, with the Radisson being just across the street. Great hotel all around, excellent value, and will definitely stay here again. I strongly recommend this property.

Reviews.Title: “Above Expectaions!”
Reviews.Author: sylvette1217
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect in everyway, very clean, beautiful spacious rooms and great customer service! I was traveling without my husband with 2 small children. I needed somewhere comfortable and close to Disney. This hotel met that and more. I had a great stay over a couple days. There was only 1 problem. I had taken my wallet out of my purse, that was all I needed at disney and carried it with me the whole stay. Put my purse in the closet, so it was out of the way. When I checked out I was distracted by my kids and left my purse in the closet. When I realized I didn't have it, I was already at home in Jacksonville, Fl! Called the hotel and not only did they have my purse, they overnighted it to me!! I got it back with EVERYTHING in it. I had my passport in it and some other valuables. I am leaving for Mexico in a week and was sick to my stomach worried about my passport. They were so accomodating and amazing to work with. I have Disney annual passes and will definitley be back! Thank You Radisson!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Rooms, Great Service”
Reviews.Author: ColumbusBuckeye
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights while visiting Walt Disney World and Universal. The location of the hotel is ideal. The entrance to Walt Disney World is across the street, and all of the Disney Parks were a 10 minute or so drive from the hotel. Downtown Disney is about a 20 minute walk from the hotel, which is nice if you want to go have some drinks and not worry about having to drive. The hotel is located right next to the interstate, which adds to the convenience, and we didn't hear any noise from the highway in our room. Our room was very nice, much nicer than I expected, given the price. It was equipped with a large, flat screen HDTV and sleep number beds. I have heard others give mixed reactions on the beds on this site, but I personally found them to be incredibly comfortable. The decor in the room and bathroom was modern and stylish, my only nitpick would be that the shower tiles seemed a bit ugly. Every part of the room was in pristine condition, and the housekeeping staff did a wonderful job of keeping it cleanly. We did not dine in the hotel restaurant, and we were a little disappointed to find out that there was no continental breakfast offered. I can't blame the hotel for this, as I'm sure I could have found this out in advance had I done more research. The pool area was very nice, and included a tiki-hut style bar with a friendly and attentive bartender. Drinks were reasonably priced, and the pool was open late, which is another nice touch. We had minimal encounters with the hotel staff during our stay, but when we did get a chance to interact with them, everyone was pleasant and helpful. I would not hesitate for a moment to recommend this hotel to a friend or stay again.

Reviews.Title: “More than I expected”
Reviews.Author: blondcybu
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Radisson LBV for five nights.The hotel offers free parking,free internet acess,free shuttle service to theme parks,etc... The location is excellent as the hotel is near Disney entrance and many restaurants.Price is great compared to other Radisson properties in Europe which sometimes have old and small rooms and expensive facilities.Rooms were huge and had even a sofa and small working area as well as a microwave oven and fridge.Much more than expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: parale45
Reviews.Content: I just came back from my trip to Orlando yesterday. I stayed at two different hotels and this one was better than the more expensive, resort-style hotel that I stayed at. They were even nice enough to let us check-in before 11 AM (which is check-out time). Pros: The room is spacious and modern. It is clean (and I am very picky). There is a microwave and refrigerator in every room along with a coffee maker. There is a separate small section for a sofa and desk. The staff is friendly. The bathroom is nice and clean. There are about a dozen stores in the area including: Red Lobster, Perkins, McDonalds, Taco Bell, UNOs, Waffle House and more. This hotel is very close to Disney World Theme Parks. Cons: The shuttles to the parks are limited. You need to rent a car or rely on cabs to stay at this hotel. For a taxi, I would call the general taxi number (1-407-422-2222). I had no problems with them and they send you a text telling you that a car has been dispatched to you and their cab number. All in all, I would definitely stay at this hotel again and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Roadside Letdown, Tacky and Tasteless”
Reviews.Author: MissyGalway
Reviews.Content: What a crap holiday mostly due to this awful area and hotel, unless you have a car forget it, they offer a shabby shuttle service to Downtown Disney once/ twice a day. You ask for a cab and it seems this hotel has a deal going on with their own grouppies who charge alot more than they should, we know we paid $15 to downtown on two occasions when we asked them for a cab, the return fare was $10 with a regular company. it seems that this is what they do, The driver was aggressive with us the following day because we did not call him for the return leg.Thats one thing you think you are getting help from the concierge forget it you will be dressed down when you dont paticipate in their timeshare rubbish, all we wanted was park tickets and we were told we could collect them in the morning, bring passports, credit cards minimum salary requirement etc and when it clicked and we said no thanks the abuse began........... no point in saying anything to the manager it seems they were off on a day off....... yeah guys its pretty shabby and everyday there is a different person on that desk. if you need help well we found out bits from the lady in the supermarket without the abuse or cheap scams. The rooms are big enough but dated and you may as well sleep on the road it would be quieter. Also the room safe was locked by the last people in the room and we were told the manager would have to fix it but amazingly after a dreadful 7 day stay there still was no manager available they were still on a day off, yes we did ask everyday and at different times... maybe the timeshare people control the safes. Reception staff were pretty useless too and so disinterested. What a horrible place and if we hadnt prepaid we would have ran, we thought about it would have been diificult particulary without transport and having already paid, could you see them giving a refund...

Reviews.Title: “A Great Hotel !!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: DarrolandChris
Reviews.Content: Just got home from staying at Radisson Hotel Lake Buena Vista I miss it already! It is a Very clean Hotel and I think it is Beautiful!!! The staff are the nicest people very polite and helpful!!!! The rooms are clean and modern. The only problem was the beds are alittle uncomfortable . The location of the Hotel is Great 10 minutes from all the parks by car. After a long day of walking it was great getting into the hot tub and pool then over to poolside bar!!!!.Will stay again Great Value!!!

Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For”
Reviews.Author: JapFreak
Reviews.Content: We got a pretty good deal on this hotel so it was still worthwhile even with all the let downs. I believe normal rate is somewhat $100 per night, includes free parking + internet, no resort fee, so it was very affordable. But you get what you pay for. Good - 1. Spacious room, clean and nicely decorated with large flat TV and white hotel beddings. 2. Friendly and helpful staff. 3. Many restaurants nextdoor. Bad - 1. A/C was extremely noisy. I don't recall any facilities having such noisy A/C installed nowadays. The A/C was like those invented in the 70s which kept turning on and off regularly to adjust temperate, and when it turned on it made a huge roaring sound. It was installed on floor level and the ventilation was blowing directly at your bed, we were not able to adjust the wind direction so imagine strong wind blowing at your head from time to time. 2. Water was weak, and heated water ran out after a while in the morning. 3. Internet was extremely slow. I know it's free but talking about slower than 28K. If you really had to use it not for leisure you would prefer they charge you and give you a better connection speed. It took me 3-5 mins to load one html static page. 4. Extremely bad access, if you come from the opposite side of the road you need to pass by the hotel and make a U turn at the 2nd light ahead. On a Friday night, expect to take 30 mins counting from the point you pass by the hotel, to actually entering the hotel lot.

Reviews.Title: “Great, convenient hotel”
Reviews.Author: kk1-traveller
Reviews.Content: This is really a very good hotel if you are going to disney/universal/sea world etc. in Orlando. It is clean and spacious. Lobby looks really nice and room (we had 2 queen beds) is perfect with very good air conditioning and a BIG LCD tv with many channels incl HBO. Hallways are wide and well lit and elevators are also very good. Rooms even have a fridge, microwave and safe. We didn't use the shuttle so can't comment on that. We had a rental car. The hotel has free parking, free wifi and wired internet and NO RESORT FEES. Most hotels in this area have the dumb resort fees tacked on to your bill which I think is a complete scam. The hotel also has a couple computers in the lobby with FREE printing (even 5 star hotels charge for printing). This was very convenient to print directions, boarding passes etc. The staff is very friendly. We did not eat at the hotel or swim in the pool but there are hundreds of restaurants on the street that it's on so no problem there either. We got a fantastic deal thru hotwire and overall I think this is a very nice and convenient hotel and we would not hesitate to stay again. Thank-you Radisson for a great Orlando stay!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel & service & great value”
Reviews.Author: lanceturner
Reviews.Content: The service we experienced from Adriana, Lisa, Hiana & Amanda at reception to the manager Terry & the cleaning staff & the very friendly bar & restaurant staff was absolutely 1st class. The rooms were fresh, spacious & cleaned extemely well. The location was great, very easy to get to Disney or to town, Amenities included all you could possibly want in a hotel. The service was the best & i would absolutely reccomend this hotel & staff to anyone travelling to Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “Tremendous Value”
Reviews.Author: MinuteCEO
Reviews.Content: I found the room, staff, easy-to-find-location off the expressway, and food to be excellent. The price was very reasonable and a tremendous value. I am in the hospitality business and applaud this hotel (led by its General Manager Terry Novalis) for creating a welcoming environment that is quite appealing. Keep up the terrific service Radisson Lake Buena Vista!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome deal, great service, and convenient location”
Reviews.Author: lisacco17
Reviews.Content: Sometimes you have to beware the awesome deals down in Orlando. Low rates can often mean you're getting a not-so-nice hotel room. There is no need to be wary of a deal at this hotel. It's a great rate for a nice hotel room. The beds are very comfortable. The room was spacious and we got a nice bag of goodies (including free samples, a bottle of water, snacks, etc.) when we first got to our room. I loved that. I also loved that there was a small refrigerator in the room. I did only give 4 out of 5 stars for cleanliness of room because there was a romance novel and something else left on the nightstand when we walked in, but that wasn't really a big deal. The room was clean. The location is very convenient as it is located right next to an entrance to I-4, and is about a 5 min drive to Downtown Disney. It is within walking distance (less than 5 minutes) to quite a few restaurant chains, including Pizzeria Uno, Taco Bell, McDonalds, Chevys, and several others. I found a great rate on Travelzoo, $88 total with taxes and that included $20 toward the restaurant which was excellent. We both enjoyed the breakfast buffet that had the most delicious fresh fruit. There was a really nice selection, and the chef, hostess, and waitress were very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT”
Reviews.Author: BernardoAtamian
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel. Was a bit put off because it was so close to Rt. 4, but that turned out to be a plus. We were 2 min from Downtown Disney, about 10 minutes from DisneyWorld and about 20 min from Universal (if that) and we were within walking distance of some great restaurants(Perkins for breakfast next door, Uno, Johnny's, Sweet Tomato etc) There were wonderful, fresh chocolate chip cookies waiting for us at the front desk (every day around 3:00 p.m.). Our room was large and comfortable - sitting area as well as 2 queen beds (dial/number beds so we could have soft/firm mattress - :o) Very, very clean every day. Never a wait for elevator. Staff friendly and helpful. 2 Computers in lobby to use which was great when we had to print boarding passes to go home. Didn't try food in restaurant there so can't comment. Got our room through HOTWIRE (best deal going for 3.5 star hotel by the way - VERY inexpensive) and were really happy with the whole Radisson experience. I am going to return.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel to stay for visiting Disneyworld”
Reviews.Author: IllinoisMailman
Reviews.Content: I was really surprised at the value at staying at the Radisson Lake Buena Vista. Brittney at the front desk was very helpful for and question or concerns that I may have. The hotel lobby was small but modern in decor. The hotel was nice, rooms were clean and everything worked. We ate at the resturant in the hotel for breakfast. The food was good and the staff was nice. The swimming pool and hot tub was not really big but we had fun in the pool and staying at the hotub was nice after a long day. There were also cookies in the lobby which was nice. If on a budget or not, I would stay here again. All the staff were first rate. The hotel is located on a one way highway its sometimes hard to get out of or back to especially during rush hour. It is very close to all Disneyworld attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Best stay!”
Reviews.Author: retrain
Reviews.Content: Never have we experienced such service at such an excellent price. The size and cleanliness of this hotel was exceptional. We have just come from a 3 week American holiday and this Hotel exceeded all our other stays hands down. I highly recommend this hotel. Thank you Terry and all your staff for a wonderful stay, your cleaners are the best in America.

Reviews.Title: “Nicely rennovated hotel - perfect for our family!”
Reviews.Author: HuskerCob
Reviews.Content: For a family of 4 looking for somewhere in Orlando to stay within some sort of budget constraints, this hotel met our needs perfectly. The hotel is nicely appointed, and has classed itself up with service that is speedy and helpful, nice ammenities, and a location that offers a lot nearby. Hotel & Rooms: Very clean throughout! The lobby offers a restaurant (we did not try it), and a booth that offers all the tickets and information you need for your trip in the area, including Disney and Universal. Our room was clean and roomy. We had 2 queen Sleep Number beds, and a single sleeper sofa. It was quiet and comfortable. The only thing I can think of that was slightly negative was the bowl sink setup in the bathroom. It was very modern and nice, but the faucet did not reach out far enough into the bowl to make it easy to wash your hands or hair in the sink without sending water all over the countertop and mirror. Pool: Nice outdoor pool and hottub with a small cantina under the palm trees! No slides or kid-type 'toys' at the pool, but my teenagers both liked laying out in the nice poolside chairs for tanning. Location: The hotel sits on the northwest side of Apopka Vineland Rd and Interstate 4 right off the exit ramp. Across the street is the entrance into Disney World (a few blocks away from Downtown Disney). On the same side of Apopka Vineland Rd are a nice variety of restaraunts including Red Lobster, Waffle House, Taco Bell, McDonalds, Burger King, Fuddruckers, Perkins, UNO Pizza, Buffalo Wild Wings, and more. They are all within walking distance. There is also a nice small supermarket in the plaza just west of the hotel to stock up your minifridge in your room. Behind the plaza is a big minigolf facility if you'd like to enjoy an evening outing. We used the free shuttle bus in the morning of the first day to head to Universal Studios, but the time of pickup was not convenient for our family in the afternoon (they return from Universal around 6pm). We ended up just taking a taxi to various locations before our rental car was available. Also nearby are the Premium Outlets of Orlando. We went one afternoon and it was packed beyond belief! We decided not to do that again, although it was Easter time and the whole resort area was busy. (Side note: if you are coming by taxi from the western side of the hotel on Apopka Vineland Rd or from Downtown Disney, have your taxi drop you off at the Perkins just west of the hotel, otherwise they will spend an extra 5+ minutes driving east past the hotel to make a u-turn a couple of traffic lights up to get back to the hotel entrance. This will save you pretty pennies to get dropped off quicker without waiting through so many traffic lights and traffic to get to the u-turn.) Overall, we are glad we picked this hotel as it met our families needs quite nicely. The price was right and we were able to walk easily to the local restaraunts and get to our local destinations easily enough.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Money - Very Clean & Comfortable Rooms”
Reviews.Author: Zorro2426134
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Radisson for 6 nights in April for 2 adults & 2 kids (10 & 12). I booked the room on the hotel web site and took advantage of the advance purchase rates. We stayed in a Queen/Queen room. The hotel is a mid range hotel that is relatively basic, however most importantly the rooms were very spacious, very clean, quiet and comfortable. The beds were fantastic - the electric adjustments were great!! We were a little frustrated by the shuttle services to Disney World / Universal. This could be a better service (even if guests had to pay a small fee for the service). We did not eat the hotel bistro for breakfast or dinner, instead we ate breakfast at the Waffle House next door (which was great and somewhat of a novelty for us being from Australia). We also found the Uno Restaurant (100 metres down the road) to be excellent quality & value (and much cheaper than theme park options). The only criticism with the hotel are the 'catches' from the tour desk to try and get discount theme park tickets by attending a 90 minute sheraton resort time share seminar. This really frustrates us as you don't get that type of pressure in Australia when you are on holiday - it is something that we are simply not used to in Australia (I don't to get the hard sell when I am on holiday!!!!!!!!). The hotel was a welcome quiet relieft from the theme parks although they were not that close (however I guess that is why the hotel is such a low price). We would recommend this to other families travelling to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Big rooms, clean and a short drive to Disney World”
Reviews.Author: City99
Reviews.Content: We spent a couple of nights at the hotel and had no complaints at all. The location is just off the freeway, and around 5 minutes drive to the edge of the Disney estate- though as others have said it is more like 20 mins to get to one of the parks. Don't come here looking for a hotel with theme park magic. Instead, if you expect an upscale, serviceable travellers' hotel you won't go wrong. We asked for and got a quiet room and everything in the room worked as expected. We liked the adjustable beds too- very handy if you prefer a softer or firmer mattress. The staff were friendly and welcoming, and the bar food was very good too. There are plenty of places to get fast food in the vicinity and malls are a short drive away. This hotel comes highly recommended by us for a short, inexpensive stay near Disney. Pros: Proximity to Disney, malls and restaurants Great bar food and friendly bar staff Nice lobby Big rooms with sofa area and 2 queen beds Clean and modern Flat screen TV in room, Microwave and coffee maker Comfy adjustable beds Working air con Cons: Area a bit downmarket and nothing worth seeing out of the window Next to a busy road and you need to do a brave U-turn to go south on the 535 A bit soulless

Reviews.Title: “Radisson Inn LBV”
Reviews.Author: Wayne117
Reviews.Content: Hello everyone,just got back from our trip to Walt Disney World and wanted to do a review on our hotel. The Radisson Inn! There were some good things mostly, but a few bad things. The 1st thing you notice,which isn't good. Theres only one street direction to get into the hotel due to a closed media blocking the southeast direction.Alitle anoying,but you learn to navigate around that. For me,a great convience was in the same parking lot a Waffle house and a Souviner shop.I really liked that. Next, the hotel is very close to the Downtown Disney entry. ( 2 blocks!*) The Downtown Disney Hotels can be seen across the road. The Hotel (Radisson Inn)- while about 30 yrs old, if I'm not mistaken. Has a very modern look to it.Very clean. We didn't eat at the restraunt in the lobby. The room was nice and very clean.We were on the 8th floor,front of the building and had a good view. Theres a small fitness center/ a couple lobby computers for public use. NO RESORT fees,which are rip offs from other hotels and FREE Parking. Free shuttle pickups to the parks-didn't use. Mini fridge,worked great,coffee maker and microwave. Has a pool,but its very average at best.But we only used it once.Didn't have that much time for that. BEDS-sleep number beds,but they really didn't work very well.Never kept the right pressure. The bathrooms are abit small (tub too)-but adaquate. Nice large plasma TV. All in all,not bad.....and the price is good. Listen, decide how much time you are going spend at the hotel.Don't go spend $200 PN to stay at a WDW hotel just to have a place to sleep, it isn't worth it. U might be paying for features you're probably NOT going use.

Reviews.Title: “Bad location and no breakfasts when ordered”
Reviews.Author: THG74
Reviews.Content: Firstly, this hotel is surrounded by freeways, so the noise (even on the top floor) at night makes it difficult to sleep. The rooms themselves are nice enough (although the air conditioning is loud). But this place is not really near the Disney theme parks, as we had been led to believe. Busses to and from the parks are few and far between. They were ALWAYS late and one never even showed up - we had to hitch a ride with another company! Other hotels in the area offer regular busses throughout the day. The Raddison offers one there (2 to Disneyworld park) and one back at night. That's it. Don't like those times? Tough. Also, we put out our breakfast menu on the door at 10pm two nights in a row. It was never collected so we didn't get breakfast each day. That's pretty lame. Finally, I realise it's a third party - but since it's located in your hotel lobby and not clearly marked as such, the concierge desk selling timeshare "deals" is appalling. I wouldn't associate my business with such a shady vendor and it reflects really poorly on the Raddison. I wouldn't stay here again. It was pretty average.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, cheerful budget hotel but too near busy road, tries hard but tacky”
Reviews.Author: Baggeridgebaggy1
Reviews.Content: In my opinion doesnt justify high position on trip advisor - basically bit of an upmarket travel lodge with tacky fittings in communal areas. More of a two star with frills - satisfaction here relies on your expectation based on what you've paid. If you want a nice four stay pay for it With cost of flights from Europe and park costs you should go upmarket for an Extra £50 a night Taking pros and cons you might think I'm OTT especially with so many good write ups but take it from me this is not a raddison in the UK sense and simply does not give you the feel good factor Negatives; Very ugly location - too near a busy main road and an horrendous cheap and a nasty monstrosity of a gift shop right opposite Pool area is cramped and set in what amounts to a concrete jungle with lots of traffic noise New hotel but cheap and tacky fittings - If it was in it's own grounds it would give the place a different feel Positives; Rooms are sizable clean and have fridge, microwave etc - bathrooms fine but ridiculous sink There is a bar there - but no real atmosphere and hardly used Good wifi Sizeable car park - seems a safe area Walking distance to about 15 restaurants and near disney etc - however when you read it's a quarter of a mile from Disney this is only to the sign about 1.5 miles from downtown Disney The parks are circa 4 plus miles away If you've booked its not a disaster especially if you've paid circe £60 a night but my advice would be to spend another £40 a night to get a hotel with a feel good factor But this is for those on a budget

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel”
Reviews.Author: upone50
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in many hotel but none as beautiful as this one I can not begin to tell you what a an amazing staff this hotel has very prefessional and courteous !! loved very minute that I was there.Things were so well organized and clean an spotless! it impressed me so I took a picture of the elevator floor and lobby just to show my family what a beautiful place it was I recommend this hotel to anyone go see for yourself. I will defintely be returning again soon I hope!!.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel close to Disney!”
Reviews.Author: bren1519
Reviews.Content: As one who normally patronizes the Super 8 hotel chain, the Radisson was certainly an appreciated step up in luxury :). The room was gorgeous, VERY clean and had beautifully decorated. We received a welcome package with several goodies in it which was nice. The room included fridge and microwave as well as two queen beds and a sofa bed. The sleep number beds are a good idea in theory but after trying them out, I'd prefer just to have a regular bed as the controls were not very accurate and the bed not as comfortable as I would have expected. Staff went above and beyond when retrieving my cellphone for me that I left in the room on checkout. I hope we can return next year as I look forward to another stay at this lovely hotel!

Reviews.Title: “we had a wonderful time”
Reviews.Author: Winnipegger555
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with our stay at the radisson. The hotel was extremely clean and the staff was very friendly. The location is not that great as you can only enter the hotel from one direction. We were facing the highway and the noise was not loud and did not bother us. Not a fan of the bar right next to the lobby though...I would definitely stay at this hotel again,

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel!!! Way better than described!!!”
Reviews.Author: zenkis15
Reviews.Content: I'm super happy with this hotel, you won't regret it. The whole building interior and exterior look great, the king bed room on the 8th floor was unbelievable, and so comfortable. Not to many hotels gives you sleep number beds :) Great amenity!! The location it's great, it just gets a little hard to get to when you are coming from disney, but other than that its a great hotel. Thanks Radisson!!!

Reviews.Title: “An excellent choice for our Disney World vacation!”
Reviews.Author: derbydog
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Radisson Lake Buena Vista for 3 days during our spring break vacation week. It was dad and 3 girls ages 14, 11, and 9. We chose this location based on the reviews, proximity to Disney, as well as the free breakfast and wi-fi. The Good: Proximity to Disney, Very nicely appointed up-scale rooms and lobby, very clean, very friendly staff including the maintenance and cleaning staff, large rooms with a sleeper sofa, refrigerator and coffee maker in room, heat & A/C worked well, room was well maintained, rooms are quiet (good sound insulation), free parking, swimming pool with bar area. The Bad: There was no free continental breakfast, the swimming pool was rather small, no indoor pool, entrance from divided highway required frequent U-Turns. The Neutral: Sleep number beds. I was able to find a comfortable setting for the sleep number bed and slept well personally. I didn't find the bed to be as comfortable as the Sheraton Sweet Sleeper bed, but it was fine for me. Many have complained about the beds, so this may just be a personal preference item. Overall we were very happy with our stay and would definitely stay here again. We had a room with 2 queen beds and a sleeper sofa and it was reasonably priced at slightly more than one bill a night.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Customer Service!”
Reviews.Author: pilotfxe
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Radisson April 1-3, 2011. My wife & I arrived around 9:00PM with our overly tired 8 year old son. I went to check in, and everything was so quick and easy I could not believe it. They even gave me a cool welcome pack that had a razor, etc in it. Nice Touch! Our room was spotless and very nice, with plenty of towels which is a big help when you are traveling with children! We were at the Sun-N-Fun Airshow in Lakeland all day, and when we came back to the hotel that night, the mail had even organized everything next to the sink! Fantastic Surprise, since I know we left so quickly early in the morning I know we had left that area kind of messy, so the housekeeping staff is great! Anyone looking for a family friendly hotel with an amazing staff try this hotel, it is now our place to stay when in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great.....”
Reviews.Author: deals4
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Radisson from 3/15/11 to 3/30/11, the General Manager (Terry) and the staff were very engaging and helpful. The property was clean and new, close to all the Parks and Restaurants, the bar at the hotel was comfortable and welcome all, the bar tender (Shawn) was very friendly and like us enjoyed watching sports.

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel that has everything you need”
Reviews.Author: mark_butler70
Reviews.Content: This was our first time to the US and we couldnt have been happy with our choice of Hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful and always greeted us with a smile. The hotel is perfectly located just off the freeway and is minutes away from take aways, restaurants and convienence store. It's is close to outlet shopping and free daily shuttles get you to all the major attractions. The local bus service stops just up the road and can take you just about anywhere you want to go. The hotel rooms were very large with very comfortable beds which can be adjusted to suit your individual needs. After being out sightseeing all day it almost felt like coming home when we got back to the hotel, especially when you walk into the lobby and smell the freshly cooked choc chip cookies at reception which were complimentary for the guests, a very nice touch! We had a great stay and have already recommended it to a friend who is travelling later this year to the US. If we ever make it back to Orlando this is difinitely where we'll stay. A wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great value close to disney”
Reviews.Author: beacontide
Reviews.Content: I stayed five nights march 2011 at this hotel after combing the ta reviews for a nicer hotel at a fair price near disney.
