Reviews.Author: gina061
Reviews.Content: Fantastic spacious rooms. Great boutique style bathroom. Excellent location for Downtown Disney concert at house of blues.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: poppyOttawa
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the excellent value provided by this hotel. The staff were courteous and helpful and the extra effort was most appreciated including the free shuttle to Disney. Rooms were spacious and very comfortable and Chef Mark went out of his way to please in the dining room.

Reviews.Title: “Met all of our needs”
Reviews.Author: cassieflat
Reviews.Content: Just back from Orlando. Before booking a hotel we did a lot of research into location, quality of hotel, room rates etc and I have to say that we were not disappointed after selecting and staying at this hotel. I travelled with my wife and two children and we had two rooms. The hotel ensured that the rooms were on the same floor and next door to each other which was good. The hotel met all of our needs, large rooms, very clean, car parking, swimming pool etc to name but a few. This hotel is located in a good area for Disney (I would recommend having a car, but the hotel did have a shuttle bus) and it has plenty of eating places within walking distance. Also the Premium Outlet Stores are only 2 miles away. This is the first time we have stayed with Radisson and we were very impressed, they even matched our rate when we found cheaper rates on Expedia after booking direct with them. Don't worry about the turn right only from the hotel when actually you want to go left, a minor issue. So, a good hotel, great rates and even the rain kept away!! I have no problem in recommending this hotel and we will certainly look at Radisson hotels when we plan our next trip.

Reviews.Title: “I stopped looking for hotels once I found the Radisson, Lake Buena Vista”
Reviews.Author: costarr
Reviews.Content: Every time I visit the rooms are perfectly cleaned and the staff has a little "treat" waiting for me..cookies and new hair products this time! I am always greeted at the front desk like a favorite cousin! The housekeeping staff kept my room in perfect order and the bath products were replenished daily. I have trained my friends to ignore other hotels and stay at this hotel. The Sleep Number beds were the "wow factor" for my first friend who visited there.

Reviews.Title: “WELL... THE REVIEWS ARE CORRECT. great place”
Reviews.Author: owen30
Reviews.Content: we got this hotel thru priceline and for a good price. we landed at orlando intl. airport 5:30 AM and got to the hotel very early in the morning, before the check-in time. happily, when we came to the hotel we got our room, which was very clean and VERY spacious. there are free shuttles from the hotel to disneyworld, and its only 10 min. to seaworld (boring), 15 min. to universal parks (great). 5 min to premium outlet shopping center. free parking. there is free wi-fi and 2 computer stations in the lobby, and nice staff to help you with your needs. i would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “EXCEPTIONAL HOTEL,STAFF,LOCATION AND VALUE”
Reviews.Author: davewhitleybay_10
Reviews.Content: I could not believe the bad comments from previous guests. My wife and I stayed 2 weeks in Sept 2010 and it was fantastic. The rooms were large and very clean(Thanks Rosa),fridge and microwave a bonus. Swimming pool was big and cleaned daily. Hotel so close to Downtown Disney that we walked on one day. Premium Outlet ,Wal Mart and plenty of restaurants nearby. Access to I4 handy to travel to our golf days out. We will certainly stay here again and recommend it to all. .

Reviews.Title: “best hotel in area”
Reviews.Author: daverosebrock
Reviews.Content: my wife and i stayed at the radisson this past weekend on 17 sep. and we just loved it. Stephen was very helpful to us and was very polite. we plan on staying there when we go back on the weekends . the radisson is the best hotel in the area that we have stayed in so far, andwill be going back again.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this place!”
Reviews.Author: rosales22
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Radisson for a week with my husband and our son, we were very content with our stay. The location was great! The hotel was beautiful and clean! We did not have any problems or complaints the whole time we were there. My son loved the free cookies they offer in the front desk. Staff was friendly and willing to help out when we needed information on the surroundings. The pool was clean and never packed! Overall I loved the Radisson and I would definitely recommend this hotel to ANYONE traveling to Orlando. Definitely would stay here again! If you are the type of person that chooses the hotel based on reviews, trust me you won't be dissapointed. I wasn't!! Excellent place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: traveler01062011
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here after our wedding and had a grand experience. Upon arrival, the Front Desk people were very kind and congratulated us on our marriage. My husband even surprised me by calling the hotel ahead of time and had hotel staff decorate our room! The room we had was very spacious and comfy...it even had a whirpool IN THE ROOM!! Evferything about this hotel was perfect. The restaurant had delicious food in the morning, we had the buffet. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family every time Orlando is the destination.

Reviews.Title: “WHAT A PLEASURE, WHAT A DEAL.”
Reviews.Author: ThemeParKing
Reviews.Content: My family's stay was great. I was greeted with big smiles and wonderful service from, Yaslinn and Leann. These two should be training everyone on how to make a guest feel welcome! From asking me about a room preference to seeing if I had any special needs or wants, they made me feel like I could have asked for anything and they would have taken care of it and they did. When I went to give them my AMEX card I discovered it was missing and figured the waiter at the restaurant had forgotten to return it to me. Well, these two jumped right in, asked me the name of the restaurant, called the restaurant, secured the card and told them I would be back to pick it up. WOW! Way beyond the call of duty. Room was perfect though a little tight for five of us but we were only there to sleep so it served our needs. If you are looking for friendly, spotless, very affordable and on the verge of elegant, this is were you want to stay. The only thing I could possibly complian about is if you are driving and end up West of this hotel it is an enormous pain to get back to the entrance. Don't look any further, stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent property with great service”
Reviews.Author: CMP7
Reviews.Content: I took my leisure travel group to Orlando for a football game weekend. The hotel staff is great, the rooms were exceptional and the location is perfect for anything you want to do in Orlando or Disney. The sleep number beds were great. There was not one complaint from a group of 54 people regarding the hotel, its staff or its service. I will stay at the Radission Lake Buena Vista for all of my Orlando travels and reccommend it to everybody.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: Seefeel
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Orlando for the second time and we choose this hotel this year after reading the good reviews here. The hotel is indeed a great deal and the rooms are very nice. I don't like the sleep-comfort beds though, but that's my opinion. The air-conditioning in our room was loud, but we got used to it. The cleaning lady did a great job and our room was always tidy when we got back from our trips. A lot of nice restaurants in the area for everyone's tastes and the free shuttle bus to Disney was ok. Service of the hotel was good, fast, friendly and always with a smile. I'd recommend this hotel for everyone who's traveling to see Disney.

Reviews.Title: “Best location & value in Lake Buena Vista area”
Reviews.Author: pamelasales
Reviews.Content: If you travel on business you know what you like and this is one of the best hotels I've found in the Orlando Lake Buena Vista area. It's priced right & has no resort fees or added charges at check out which my company won't pay. Room service is quick and reasonable priced, the coffee maker and frig in the room is a plus, they even give you a free bottled water in the room. The TV is a larger than usual, flat panel, attached to the wall for perfect viewing from the bed. The rooms are super clean, as is the whole place and the staff are friendly and courteous. I 'm actually looking forward to my next month's calls in Orlando and staying at this Radisson again. Plus its only 5 minutes to Downtown Disney which is a great place to unwind after working all day & the Outlet Mall is just as close.

Reviews.Title: “Top Notch for Excellent Price”
Reviews.Author: TravelingWilburies
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a 8 night stay at this hotel....location is perfect.....easy access (one block) to entrance of Disneyworld area and one u turn away from the I-4 which takes you to all major attractions very quickly. Shopping at Premium Outlet and Prime Outlets only minutes away. Rooms are large with comfortable beds....microwave, fridge, flat screen, couch and sitting area. Extremely clean and overall top notch. We only paid $69 per night and can honestly say that it is a steal of a deal....same hotel in Canada would be over $150 per night. Walmart only about 3 miles down the 535...Flippers Pizzeria - ordered that in twice...very good and cheap. Don't pay triple to stay on the park when this hotel is one block out of the main entrance....not worth it...they also have a shuttle service to the parks...but we did not use it as we had rented a car and wanted the flexibility to come and go as we please. If I had any suggestions it would be to clean the hot tub on a more regular basis...however, it was not filthy at all...just needed debris cleaned out daily.

Reviews.Title: “Staff was friendly. Location was close to...”
Reviews.Author: djdelite
Reviews.Content: Staff was friendly. Location was close to downtown Disney & a few miles outside of Disney parks.. Pool was nice.. Only issue was the elevator is pretty loud but whatever ur not in the room to live there.. We went July 19-24.. Good times thanks staff.. Oh yeah don't forget those free cookies they were super good..

Reviews.Title: “great stay!!!!recomended!!”
Reviews.Author: ilanit
Reviews.Content: we came for few days,family of 5.it wasnot ready at the time we arrived but the stuff was really nice and welcoming.we left the laugege there,got later a great room,wide,clean,big enough for all of us.The beds where super!!The reception where very friendly,answered all questions,gave directions and helped us.It was very convinient to buy there most of the entrance tickets to the attractions. excellent for larger famillies.Have also a washing machine and dryer at 2 fl. which was a big help. And also at a great location!! Dont heasetate.it is great!!!

Reviews.Title: “The ONLY place my family and friends will stay”
Reviews.Author: cerin80
Reviews.Content: My family has stayed at this hotel numerous times and love to bring friends as well. Everything you ever need for a very reasonable price and they have great specials that make it even more affordable. Rooms are beautiful, modern and very spacious. All service is excellent there from the people checking you in to housekeeping. Cleanest hotel I have ever had the pleasure of staying in. The pool is sparkling clean at all times not to mention spacious and they have a poolside bar with full service facing an entrance to Disney. Shopping, dining and mini-golf in walking distance make your stay convenient as well as how close you are to the theme parks. The restaurant; as well as room service is top notch. Food is excellent, tasty and prepared by a very talented chef. Room service is prompt and has never messed up our order. Now that i have found this little treasure i will not be staying anywhere else in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Value”
Reviews.Author: jodyg376
Reviews.Content: My 18 year old daughter and I spent 4 days at the Radisson. Our room was spacious, well appointed and spotlessly clean. In fact, the entire hotel was well maintained from the lobby to the hallways. The hotel is also very well located and is an easy drive to all the attractions and shopping. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The free internet and parking were added bonuses. I would only caution people on two things. Firstly, their pool are, although clean is relatively small and simple. It is great if you need a dip in the pool to cool off but it is not an area where one might want to lounge for a few hours. Second, their guest services desk is staffed by representatives of a timeshare organization. They promote discounted attraction tickets but those come at a price - a tour of the timeshare facilities. Not only that, once the represenative found out I was travelling without my husband, I was informed that I was not eligible for the tour even if I had been interested (which I wasn't). All that said, I would still highly recommment this hotel to people travelling to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel!”
Reviews.Author: marius883
Reviews.Content: Very clean hotel, cleaning every day, and very friendly staff who provided excellent service. The area around the hotel is also very nice and family friendly, you got a grocery store and olive garden, mcds, taco bell and so on walking distance away. I will definitely stay here again the next time I visit Orlando 5/5!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for what you get”
Reviews.Author: cfultyn
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here the second weekend in August for his birthday and thoroughly enjoyed this hotel. When checking-in the guest service representative was very friendly and accommodating. We were quite impressed when we got to our room, it was very modern and clean. Flat screen TV. Microwave. Fridge. Sleep Number Beds. Ipod plug-in for the radio. The Views are nice as well, get a good look at the Lake Buena Vista Area. The only drawback to staying at this hotel is accessing it. Unfortunately it is located on one of the busiest streets around Disney and there is no left turn entry if traveling south, so you have to go down and make a u-turn to loop back and turn right into the hotel. This was not an issue for us as we thought that the price for the hotel made up the difference. We would definitely stay here again and recommend to other who want to save on their pennies but not compromise on service or quality of hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value and location”
Reviews.Author: john3690
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a 14 day stay at the Radisson, from July 23rd to Aug 6th 2010, and I can't believe the recent negative comments on this site. I have stayed in many Hotels in the USA, and quite frankly for value for money this one is right up there with the best. We had two rooms on the sixth floor and I was extremely impressed with this hotel. We were made very welcome on arrival, despite a short power cut on our arrival (the whole street suffered a brief outage) we were dealt with very efficiently despite the computer system being down. The room cleaners were cheerful and always said hello. The cleanliness of the room was exemplary, fresh bed sheets and towels every day. My wife was impressed by their attention to detail, when arranging the toiletries etc. Admittedly we were not in a room closest to the lift shaft, but I find anyone complaining of the noise hard to fathom, as they seemed to be very quiet and smooth. As for the traffic and not being able to turn into the hotel when travelling South on the 535, all you do is travel under the the I4 flyover (do not attempt to turn before the flyover as this is illegal and very dangerous) keep left, there are two left turn lanes towards Vineland Ave. Keep in the furthest left lane an do a U turn at these lights (you will see the Golden Corral on your left). Pass back under the I4 flyover and turn into the hotel. Even in the busiest of traffic this is simple and very quick. I have stayed in locations in Florida that involved extended driving (60 mins is not unusual to some attractions) so a 3 or 4 minute detour is nothing to complain about. From the Radisson the entrance to Disney is less than 1 minute North down the 535. This gives quick and easy access to Down town Disney, then on to all the Parks. Make a U turn at the petrol garage opposite the Hotel and you can join the I4 East and West, from one slip road– also in less than 1 minute. Sea World and Universal are reached swiftly and easily. The Radisson Lake Buena Vista is an excellent choice for a value family hotel, and I would not hesitate to recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent price,,,exceptional stay!”
Reviews.Author: smfarre
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for six nights from July 4-10. Arriving on the 4th of July was not the smartest idea on our part, as the traffic was unbearable to even get down the street. We thought we really bombed in hotel location, but that was where our problems ended. The traffic was not bad any other day we stayed there. Yes the divided road was a little inconvenient, but we quickly adjusted and it was very easy to navigate throughout the rest of our trip. You can actually see the entrance to Disney World from the parking lot,,it was that close. The entrance quickly takes you to the Downtown Disney area. We loved everything about this hotel. We arrived a bit early, and the front desk did it's best to get us in quickly,,,,we arrived about 3 hours prior to check-in on July 4,,,a very busy day, and we still managed to get our room well before the official 3pm check-in. Our room was in a very quiet location on an upper floor. We had no problem with noise. The sleep number beds were nice. We ate breakfast in the hotel restaurant about 4 of our 6 days there. We got the buffet each day. WELL WORTH it especially if you're heading to a Disney park for the day. There was always fresh fruit available and lots of it! The pineapple was amazing! Even though it is buffet style, they will make you made to order omelettes and pancakes to your liking. The food and beverage manager, Vijay Bhardwaj was out there just about every day we ate, asking us(and others dining) how their meals were. He took great pride in his work. He made us delicious onion omelettes with very light monteray jack cheese, and cooked it perfectly. He started noticing our order each AM, and would come out and say hello. The blueberry pancakes had fresh blueberries in them, not frozen or dried ones,,,,delicious! He even sold us to eat dinner there,,, and that was very good as well. It was also a very relaxing and peaceful place to eat breakfast. Although, we were there pretty early each morning! I am shocked by the comments about stealing in other reviews. Personally, both look like the same person. It also sounds like she misplaced it to begin with. Most thieves don't have the conscious to return it! Our experience with the housekeeping service was quite the opposite. They were very respectful not to disturb large suitcases or things that you clearly wanted there. One thing that impressed me was that on our first day of cleaning, our housekeeping person actually took the many products we had stacked on each side of the sink, and placed them neatly and orderly on towels, so they wouldn't get wet next to the sink. I thought that was above and beyond. We had quite a lot of things, and we really appreciated that. We also asked for extra towels on a note each night and she always had them available. The exercise room was a little tight, but had enough for who was there. The pool was perfect for the size of hotel that it was. It was never super crowded, and it too was very clean. The loungers were very comfortable. There were plenty of towels provided. The only thing that was annoying were the different establishments that would try to shove menus or advertisements into your door in the evenings. I was just about asleep one night, and then I heard someone shoving something in the door. I am sure the hotel does not promote this, as when I opened the door, the kid scampered down the steps before I could even say anything. If anything, the ads made me not want to go there! Every staff member I came into contact with was very respectful and did their best to make our stay enjoyable. I am returning to Orlando in October, and I will be booking soon. I will stay here again, without hesitation. In fact, I cannot wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Please think twice before you think of a possibility of staying here!!!! Bad!!! Stay away.”
Reviews.Author: Nicolewyers
Reviews.Content: First off - vacation is meant to be full of relaxation not stress and fear. I first arrived at hotel, with high hopes that it would fulfill my standards. To some prevail I thought it had. WAIT-- 2 days into my stay, my JEWELRY had gone MISSiNG!! let me tell you, there was a SHHHHH... DO NOT ENTER sign on the door, but housekeeping proceeded with no prevail and no guilt to steal my personal belongings!! I immediately brought this to Management and guess what he did- laughed and treated this with no importance! Instead of taking care of paying customers he called us liars and decided to have a screaming match. Please anyone reading this, know that this is not wrote to attack anyone but to save you and your belongings before u would even consider giving this hotel your money when they WILL steal your belongings and then laugh at u!!!

Reviews.Title: “BEYOND IMPRESSED WITH THIS FABULOUS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: cholestar
Reviews.Content: We were nervous to book our hotel online without seeing it in person, but we were BEYOND IMPRESSED upon our arrival at the Radisson. The rooms are extremely well-kept and decorated in a classy, sophisticated style. I would recommend this hotel to ANYONE, ANYTIME.We felt very welcomed by all staff at the hotel. The ladies who cleaned our floor were always very friendly and smiled when we walked by. The Liquid Bar staff was genuine and personable, making it enjoyable to sit at the bar or in the restaurant and eat. The appearance of the hotel, from the lobby to the rooms, was exceptional. Though the hotel is located next to the free way, we never heard any cars and were thankful for the easy access to the highways, attractions and Downtown Disney. This a great deal for an amazing hotel. Thank you for making our trip to Orlando comfortable and stress free!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel but inconvenient entry if traveling on opposite side of the road.”
Reviews.Author: RCS22
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the stay very much and extended our week by two more days. The hotel was beautiful and had friendly and professional staff. The only thing with didn't enjoy was having to bypass the hotel and drive about three blocks up to make a u-turn to pull into the entrance. Other than that we loved it.

Reviews.Title: “So pleased....I decided to extend my stay”
Reviews.Author: Dusty71
Reviews.Content: I regularly travel for business and have to say I was impressed with the size and cleanliness of the room. I spent a week at this location with my wife and 2 kids (10 and 14). We had plenty of room to relax and slept great on those sleep number beds. It is very close to the parks and downtown Disney. It also has numerous dining options within walking distance that range from fast food to steaks and seafood.

Reviews.Title: “four star quality for a great price”
Reviews.Author: antheaskyblue
Reviews.Content: we wanted a base to go out to disneyland from with our young children and this ticks all the boxes. fabulous service, great rooms, good breakfasts and 2 mins walk to next doors dining/retail park with 8 or so different restaurants so you didn't have to drive out for your evening meal. it's right next to the main road so not a great view but this didn't matter for what we wanted and the rooms were quiet. only 15min drive to disney and about 20mins from the airport wouldn't hesitate to go again

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, good location, good value, would go back again”
Reviews.Author: SolovoyagerIstanbul
Reviews.Content: It's very close to Disney World, the taxi fare is $15 at most, but you don't have to pay because it has a complimentary scheduled shuttles. If on the way back to hotel, you miss the shuttle, use Dİsney free transportation to Disney downtown and then it's only $3-5 to the hotel. Is not it great? It's very close the Premium Outlets you can walk there or pay $8 to the taxi. Once after I got there, I used green buses to Prime outlets which also passed by Seaworld, and Universal Studios for only $1:) You can also make a negotiation with the taxis, they take you to Seaworld for $15, Universal Studios $25 and Prime Outlets $30. So I'd strongly recommend this hotel if u want to go to Disney Parks:) Besides that, the rooms are very spacious, I preferred the room that is far away from the elevators, so I didnot hear any noise, the beds are sleep number and very very comfortable. There are microwave, fridge in the room. What's more, the staff are very helpful however I dont recommend you to buy Disney tickets or any other tickets from the hotel if the season isnot very high. Because the tickets r considerably higher than Disney enterance and there wasnot any line in Disney in May. So I regret buying the tickets beforehand. And also there is a very big supermarket behind the hotel and a waffle house in front of it from where you can have ur breakfast for $8.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: TravellingWilbury50
Reviews.Content: We stayed a week at the hotel and have absolutely no complaints. The hotel was completely renovated and everything was clean and new. The price was just a little over $100 a night and therefore of a great value. Would definately choose this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Much better than expected!”
Reviews.Author: laulau007
Reviews.Content: Having stayed in some pretty expensive American hotels, I have to say I was expecting an average hotel, nothing special. However, this place was well above my expectations. I love Florida, especially Orlando, mainly because you always get the sense of having an amazing time and you know everyone's enjoying themselves. This hotel just made a day of the parks and malls end perfectly. The facilities I would rate 20/10, and the staff are so friendly, even though Americans are cheery all the time anyway! They never stopped smiling and that's what you need, really. We got an upgrade because my daughter had fainted coming off the plane and still wasn't feeling good. Which was lovely! Easy access to the parks, friendly atmosphere in a stylish hotel. I'll definitely be returning soon!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay!”
Reviews.Author: Hiramg
Reviews.Content: Well to begin with I stayed in this Hotel because of the good reviews that its been receiving lately and were all true!!!! It’s a excellent and very clean Hotel, it has a great location, only walking distance from good places to eat like IHOP Perkins, Olive Garden, etc and a gas station nearby, the property and surroundings felt safe for me and my family. The room condition was great and clean, AC working perfectly and good view. But front desk personnel have to improve their people skills especially in check-in. but their was another front desk employee that went beyond and above helping me place a order of flowers for my wife, she was very helpful. There were loud noises in guest hallways (not as loud in a Disney’s Value resort) but that’s expectable in high season, due to that, one night I had trouble parking because the lot was completely full. Overall it was a great experience and I recommended anybody to stay in this property.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Great restaurant, Loved it!!!”
Reviews.Author: nolson1
Reviews.Content: We stay mostly at Radisson, this was our first time at this location and loved it. My wife shops at the outlet mall every month. Our only problem was the traffic in and out of the hotel. Now we know know this is a problem, we will plan our in and out when is less of a problem. This is a premier hotel that you must try!

Reviews.Title: “I'm booking again already”
Reviews.Author: goldie1804
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel 5 or 6 times in the last 2 years. The rooms are fab, staff excellent and I always feel like I'm coming home when I arrive. Luke is the best barman, and always treats me to a big hug on arrival. It is so nice to be recognised! We have never had any problems at this hotel and the value for money is amazing. Highly recommended for everyone going to Orlando, Cheers guys xx

Reviews.Title: “Next to Downtown Disney, super clean, nice, and great staff!”
Reviews.Author: Amypd
Reviews.Content: Awesome location. Our room had a frig, microwave, two queen beds, and a sleeper sofa. There are granite counters and very clean rooms. Free parking...best place around Disney. If this hotel were on the property it would be well over $300/night. We are staying again in July!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, definitely worth the money spent!”
Reviews.Author: elchinoviejo
Reviews.Content: To start off with, as soon as we arrived check-in was fast and the service was excellent. The staff were friendly and willing to help with any problem. When we got to our room, it was spacious, extremely clean, and had exclusive sleep-number beds. Plus, the A/C cooled fast and worked great. The bathrooms were big and very modern and the room had a microwave, refrigerator, coffee-maker, and a safe. As for the swimming pool, it was big and clean and they also had a jacuzzi which was very relaxing. The swimming pool area also contained a tiki bar, that i wasn't able to try but looked great. I also tried the gym that contained machines that were very up to date and worked wonderfully. The bar area located inside the hotel had wonderful staff especially Mr. Vijay Bhardwaj who is the food and beverage manager at the hotel. He was very helpful and attended me with fast service and helped me with any accommodations I needed throughout my stay. The location of the hotel was great. It was with in walking distance to many restaurants and less than a mile away from Downtown Disney. It was also close to I-4. Overall, my stay at this hotel was beyond my expectancy. I would defiantly rate this hotel 5 stars and recommend to anyone. I will certainly be back for another stay. By the way, in the lobby they had freshly baked cookies that could be enjoyed by the guests, they were delicious :)

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and professional staff, good location, great food.”
Reviews.Author: Michael0707
Reviews.Content: Really friendly service and good value. Rooms were clean, beds comfortable, pool good, food great. Chef Mark made great food and was very welcoming, hotel manager also very helpful. Good location for going to Universal and Disney. Free wi fi great for kids. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Stay here if you're visting Disneyworld”
Reviews.Author: kptrs
Reviews.Content: New hotel. Great service. Large rooms. Pool big enough to enjoy (if you or the kids even have any energy to spend after a day at Disney). We saved on food budget by using fridge and microwave. There is a grocery store within walking distance. Hotel is closest to entrance to Downtown Disney and close enough to other parks. We visited Animal Kingdom, Hollywood Studios, Downtown Disney and Magic Kingdom from this hotel. (Commute will take a few minutes but leave hotel with enough time to be at the parks 1 hour before their opening times.) We didn't mind the tiny commutes considering our hotel rate compared to rates for hotels inside of Disney. Why pay the rates and be away all day? A car was the way to commute - more reliable, flexible.

Reviews.Title: “Happy and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: JimEdD
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this location for a Disney trip. They have a shuttle to Disney but we rented a car to have the most flexibility in and out of the parks. Since we had teens and the price was less than $100 per night, we got separate rooms. ( The kids loved this and so did we.) Rooms are pretty big, very clean and the staff is nice. Nothing better than to have friendly people smile at you after waiting in those long lines coming back from Disney. They have the sleep number matresses which were fine but didn't use the feature too much. The pool was fine but we didn't get a chance to use it much. The location is about 4-5 blocks from Downtown disney. Also, it is very close to many restaurants and shops. You can walk to the Waffle house for breakfast if you want. Overall, a very nice place to stay if you want Disney at a better value without compromising convenience and quality.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, very clean, and it was close to Disney!”
Reviews.Author: TontoF92
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 7 days last week and really have nothing but good things to say about the hotel. The staff is very friendly and the rooms were spotless and comfortable. The location was 5 minutes from Downtown Disney and 10 minutes to the Magic Kingdom if you are driving. The outlet mall is 5 minutes down the road, and there are many many good chain restaurants within 5 minutes of the hotel. The U-turn to get back to the hotel is a little tricky but really not that big of a deal. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay near Disney. I was able to secure a very low rate on Priceline.com using the "name your own price" bidding system.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: brittymac
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at this hotel before visiting Disney World. This is one of the nicest hotel's we have ever stayed at and the value is unbeatable! The rooms are very nice and the hotel is well kept. The hotel is only a 5 minute drive to Disney, which was very convenient for us. There are also a giftshop and a Waffle House on the property, both of which we visited. This hotel is top notch and a fantastic value! We will definitely be staying here on our next Disney trip! P.S. The cookies in the lobby at night are an excellent touch for a girl with a sweet tooth! :)

Reviews.Title: “Service that made me smile!”
Reviews.Author: DSpooner
Reviews.Content: The minute I walked in the door I was greeted with a smile at the Reception Desk I felt welcome and able to leave my worries outside the entrance! I was going to ask if we could leave our luggage there so we could go to Downtown Disney when the Hostess said the room was ready and she'd gladly check us in - what a relief that was! Then she asked if I needed any tickets for Disney etc. and showed us over to an events person who was friendly and helped us determine what we would do. When we got to the room it was beautiful - clean, very inviting and Oh those sleep number beds were great! The maid service was friendly and did a great job. My daughter wanted to go to the pool that was very nice and we totally enjoyed to cool us off from the oppressive heat! The Tiki bar outside had wonderful frozen drinks and again were served with a smile. Another pleasant experience was our breakfast in the dining room - the waitress again was so friendly and did a great job serving us and best of all after the morning chef came out along with the plates of food that were cooked perfectly and looking so wonderfully appetizing, he wanted to make sure our food was done right - I can't remember the last time any chef/waitress really showed they cared about what we thought about the food they presented -excellent!! Then there was the bus service to Disney-Epcot - once again service provided with a smile by someone who seemed really enjoy what they do and happy to serve you. I highly recommend this Radisson and will definitely pass on to all I know to stay there and plan to stay there again myself. This hotel exceeded my expectations and is one of the big reasons I truly enjoyed my visit to Orlando a week ago.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Price”
Reviews.Author: MyMaggieGirl
Reviews.Content: I loved this hotel. The mgr. Vijay was extremely helpful. ALL the staff was friendly. Any request we had, they met. We even need boxes to mail stuff and they got them for us and the tape to shut them. The beds were sleep # beds and were comfortable. The rooms were nice size, big TV, super clean. Cleanest Hotel i have stayed in. I search customer reviews when I book hotels, so I hope this helps you to choose this hotel. I honestly cant find one thing negative to say. Oh and the restuarant food was really good surprisingly.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Experience”
Reviews.Author: sadamsgreensboro
Reviews.Content: The entire staff and the General Manager Terry Novalis went above and beyond to ensure our stay was perfect. The property was spic and span and the service was perfect which is difficult to find these days . I will stay at this hotel when I return to the area and grade the staff and the hotel an A+++..

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel for a really nice price!”
Reviews.Author: PrincessWhispers
Reviews.Content: We got the room on sale the week before we wanted to stay for under $100! Awesome price and the room was well worth it. We booked this hotel for its convenience to the venue for the concert we were in town to see, it's about 10 minutes away from Universal Studios. We only stayed overnight, but our stay was fantastic! The beds are VERY comfortable, the hotel was nice and quiet all day and at night. Very comfortable and easy to get a good night's sleep. They have those sleep number beds! Got a call within 15 minutes of checking in from the front desk to ask if we needed anything and to see if we liked our room, which we did. The room was very clean and spacious and the furniture and decor was tasteful and aesthetically pleasing. For under $100 We got two queen beds and a sitting area with a couch and a desk, also a counter area with a microwave and a fridge. We also found the staff to be very friendly and approachable and there are many good restaurants nearby, even if you want to go grab a bite in the middle of the night. The hotel restaurant also serves VERY, very good food, but is a bit pricy.

Reviews.Title: “will stay again!”
Reviews.Author: aldycher
Reviews.Content: arrived at 11:30 pm, steven at the front desk was very upbeat, explained or situation, found us the best rate and room for our family ( me, daughter, sister, neice and 3 grandchildren). everything he told us was true, clean and spacious. buffet in the am was wonderful as was every "team" member we came in contact with. they all went out of their way to be sure we were taken care of as well as every other guest they came in contact with. will stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Great first time, not so great second time”
Reviews.Author: Fish86
Reviews.Content: Stayed for a week to attend training, then another night on the following weekend after traveling around Florida on vacation. First time was really nice, stayed on one of the upper floors where you can see Disney's fireworks in the distance. The only negative was the constant stream of people stuffing pizza fliers under our door, even when we were trying to get to sleep. They were so disturbing that finally I had to jam a towel under the door to stop them. Rooms were clean and the staff nice, they immediately fixed a bed that was broken, and there were no other problems. The second time I used my points to get a free room. We were placed across from the laundry room with a very ugly view (see photo). The blue neon bled through the curtains, so we had to hang towels on the window to darken the room. The laundry room smelled very musty and sour, which made entering and exiting the room kind of nasty (thus downgrading my cleanliness rating). Pizza fliers only made it to our room a few times here. Business center consisted of two computers and a printer in the lobby, which was functional.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel and exceptional value in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: alexander_lakey
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in an excellent location for the Disney Parks and attractions such as Seaworld and Aquatica (which we visted on this trip). The hotel is approx 300 yards from one of the main entry roads into the Disney Parks, so certainly on the doorstep for Disney. The hotel is on the junction of I4 and state road 535 (Apopka Vineland), however this is not apparent once inside (no road noise apparent from the room). I have only ever had a hire car in the states, so cannot comment on the shuttle bus services. Parking is readily available and free. The staff were always very courteous and helpful, the common areas of the hotel are very pleasant, the restaurant food was good (nothing special, but fairly tasty and well prepared) - and the bar is fine - especially the 'breakfast on the run' in the bar - a much lighter (and cheaper) option for brits who don't want to have to eat a whole plate of american sized breakfast before a day at the parks. Our room was very good, 2 Queen beds with good linens, a good spec (and very clean) bathroom. One slight moan (in our room - 701) - the shower curtain was too short and on a stupid curved pole, meaning every shower left the floor wet and slippery. Otherwise very impressed. The rooms have a decent fridge (not crammed with expensive 'minibar' stuff) which is very useful for cooling drinks and snacks etc. to take with you to the parks. The AC was a little noisy, but certainly very effective and it didn't keep me awake. We prepaid on the radisson website meaning this hotel cost us approx $75 per night for the whole family - an amazing deal for the quality of the hotel and service. Overall, for that money it is a no brainer and I would certainly stay again. BTW - we checked out Giftland (adjacent to the hotel and mentioned by others) - I would avoid personally, however it's presence did entertain our 6 year old who christened it 'Tatland' after our quick visit!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: travelbug1975_10
Reviews.Content: We stayed here and was a great hotel! near to Disney parks, there is a free shuttle to the parks but not really often enough to depend on if you are wanting to fit a lot in, (and we are comparing this to our last stay in a Disney hotel which has a bus every 10 mins) to drive to the parks it is $14 per day parking fee. The hotel was spotless rooms ample size and great loungers around the pool area which was also nice and quiet at times. Good breakfasts served and a waffle house and other restauraunt's within walking distance and a Disney gift shop Toiletries, hairdryer, iron, all for use in your room and adjustable beds (firm/soft by touch of a button) Thumbs up from us

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Margy65
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights and the hotel lived up to everything that had been said on Trip Adviser. Our room was great and the maid who looked after our room did amazing fans with the towels. The room was spotless. Included in our room rate was breakfast and this was really good value. Executive Chef Mark made himself known to us and made us very welcome and said that he would make us anything we wanted fresh. Eduardo in the restaurant was very good at his job. We had dinner in the hotel one night and this was very good. We spent some afternoons by the pool and the sun loungers were very comfortable but we could have done with some Umbrellas around the pool as there is not much shade around the pool area. The hotel is so handy it is just off the I4 and so close to Disney.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for Disney with free shuttle but not for Universal”
Reviews.Author: paulastaggs
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean and comfortable, staff were very helpful. Hotel even has a car rental office. There is a free shuttle to the disney parks, no need to prebook and you can buy park tickets at the hotel. There is no shuttle to Universal though, you'll need to get a cab.

Reviews.Title: “This should be back up to #1 - AMAZING HOTEL! STOP LOOKING AND GO BOOK!”
Reviews.Author: JazzyCazy
Reviews.Content: We stayed the majority of our time at Renaissance Sea World as we were in Orlando for our wedding and my mother had paid for us there. We wanted to stay a couple of extra days in Orlando and I booked Radisson based wholly on it's status on Trip Advisor. I was NOT dissappointed. First of all great service and a good rate. We decided to upgrade to have a jacuzzi in the room which was awesome. We parked which was fine and free. Internet was free. Room and bed was lovely, comfortable, very clean and worth so much more than what we paid. We ate breakfast on site which was nice but if you didn't want to pay the $13 a head, Dennys is a hop skip and a jump away. Location is awesome, very very close to Disney and walkable to a lot of restaurants. We didn't use the pool but it looked pretty nice. Overall we loved this hotel and think it is INCREDIBLE value. We wouldn't hesitate to book it again. Would be great for families or for couples or maybe business. We were very impressed and you will be too.

Reviews.Title: “like a honey moon”
Reviews.Author: MachuPicchu_10
Reviews.Content: we were celebrating many things, and was like a honey moon. The room was nice and with jacuzzi. We had a problem one day because when we came back to the hotel after shooping, the room was not clean. Just one night there was a noise but was few time. The rest of the nights was very quiet. In general the hotel was nice. And the last day we could stay one hour more in the room after the check out time.

Reviews.Title: “Employees so nice!”
Reviews.Author: KRISTAWESTPALMBEACH
Reviews.Content: We had the best bed ever! Executive Chef Mark made me whatever I wanted because Im so picky! Luke at the bar was a pleasure to talk to and Eduardo in room service & restaurant was so hospitable. The breakfast buffet was nice and made me banana panca2es and omelets to order straight from the kitchen at no additional charge..I will always stay at this location..It was clean and located next to so many things : )

Reviews.Title: “A smooth stay”
Reviews.Author: LoryTreviso
Reviews.Content: The room and bathroom were very nice and clean. The beds were very comfortable. The staff was very friendly. We used the nice pool and spa. The bar outside was closed the evening we were there but we forgot to ask what time it is usually opened (we were able to get drinks from the liquid bar). We tried the bar and the restaurant and they were very nice. The breakfast buffet is not included in your room but it is a very good buffet with lots of fresh fruit and many items cooked to order like pancakes, eggs etc. Chef Marc came out to see his guests and check if everything was good. Overall a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “New, Clean, Comfortable, but not like Radisson standard of Australia”
Reviews.Author: bebackshortly
Reviews.Content: The hotel address is difficult to locate (at least for us with 1 year old US TomTom map 12799 Apopka Vineland Rd does not exist). However, after being taken on a joy ride to the other side of Orlando TomTom was switched off and the hotel easily found off the Interstate 4. The hotel staff were friendly, but not refined or upscale as I would expect from the Radisson experience in Australia. But I think that's just a reflection of the general customer service ethic or lack there of in the USA as a whole. The sleep number bed is comfortable enough and an interesting hotel concept, but not close to the comfort of Westin Heavenly or Sofitel MyBed etc... It's just air! The hotel is new and that provides the major comfort... The rooms feature flat screen TV's but they are cheap and the speakers send out plastic sounding vibrations at the slightest hint of bass. Our TV ended up on an angle after vibrating itself to that position... For some reason many TV stations had no sound... The pre-programmed buttons on the phone did not work, nor did the drink vending machine or ice machine on our floor, but a short lift ride resolved that. Most unusual is that the hotel staff claimed the hotel have no international power adaptors. This is a first for me having stayed at hotels all over the world... As a result, a flat camera and many missed photo opportunities at Disney etc... Despite this, the hotel on this occasion was good value for the quality of sleep and modern comfort, so close to the Disney area, Outlet stores and many food options... The eyesore of 'Gifland' is unfortunate... Hopefully progress will see that bulldozed soon! At the right price, this hotel is a good option for a visit to Disney....

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: twald123
Reviews.Content: Nice Staff and Great Property. Very impressed and will return.

Reviews.Title: “Why stay anywhere else in the Orlando area??”
Reviews.Author: kbofsrq
Reviews.Content: My second stay within the last five months. Super clean, excellent comfy beds and pillows ( I don't even have to bring my own down pillow!) and I LOVE the duvet idea. This hotel is like sleeping in your own home. Fluffy towels and very nice accessories in the very posh bathroom. For the price, the rooms are A+++. Perfect location to Disney attractions without having to pay the resort tax. We hesitated eating in a "hotel" restaurant, but couldn't have been more pleased with their restaurant - what presentation - like Paris! If more hotels were like this, we wouldn't stay home!

Reviews.Title: “The most comfortable sleep number beds with great service!!!”
Reviews.Author: BeccaBooBear
Reviews.Content: We arrived in Orlando around 11AM and I expected to have to drop off our baggage and head out and wait til check in. The front desk was more than happy to accomodate us in a different room and we were able to check in our room immediately. The room was nice with two queen size sleep number beds- these beds were the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in in my life! They have me sold and I will buy one in the near future! The hotel was not very busy and it was very quiet at night. The front desk was extremely helpful in giving us directions to DisneyWorld and Downtown Disney. I liked this location because it was away from the hustle and bustle of the Disney Resorts, but it was still extremely close to everything. It is five minutes or less away from Downtown Disney and about 15-20 minutes away from Magic Kingdom and Epcot. They do have their own bus that brings you to and from the parks, which we chose to use instead of the rental car to save $14 dollars in parking. The buses were nice and air conditioned- my only compliant was that the Magic Kingdom bus only has one departure and one arrival. It forces you to stay from 10AM to 10:45PM- but it was well worth it! I would definitely stay there again on another stay.

Reviews.Title: “When I opened the door to my room, I felt like I died & went to heaven!”
Reviews.Author: Likestosew
Reviews.Content: Very pleasant; staff excellent; convenient transport to WDW; nice restaurant-good food; easy walk to plenty of other restaurants; nice pool; room very comfy and streamlined; very modern bath; I would go here again, and I will recomment this property to others!

Reviews.Title: “very clean and new hotel”
Reviews.Author: joeyboy79
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very clean and lobby and rooms look and fell very new. An excellent choice for staying Orlando. Staff very friendly and helpful at the front desk. Will definitely return next time we are in the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great stay! Would recommend this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: pearlsgirls
Reviews.Content: This hotel is only about 2 years old so everything is nice and new and very clean. The staff was phenomenal! The ladies at the reception desk couldn't have been nicer or more helpful. Check-in was a breeze and we were quickly off to our room. The room had 2 double sleep number beds, which was a huge plus. The beds were very comfortable and everyone had a great night's sleep. We also had a loveseat, desk, flat screen tv, mini fridge and microwave. The bathroom had a tub/shower which was great for bathing the kids. Again, everything was new and in great condition. The only complaint we had is that the water got really hot and both my husband and I burned our hands trying to test the shower water. This could potentially be a health hazard as a child could easily scald themselves. We watched our children very carefully and did not allow them into the bathroom alone because of this fact. The pool area was small and no frills but very nice. Our children enjoyed splashing around in the pool before we hit the theme parks each day. The location of the hotel is very convenient to Disney (not sure about the other parks because we only went to Disney). The only problem with the location is that traffic was terrible at 10 pm after the fireworks at Disney and it took a long time to get through the traffic lights. The hotel is located at an intersection, however you can not make a left hand turn into the parking lot. You have to continue on and make a u-turn further up the road. This was slightly inconvenient, although coming from Disney the turn into the hotel is on the right so it wasn't a big deal for us.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: deew76
Reviews.Content: We stayed there the first week in May for 5 days and had a wonderful stay. I am OCD so the first thing I did was check the beds and sheet. Not one stain on the beds. Everything was spotless. We had a bit of trouble with the room smelling like smoke and with in 15 mins someone came to the room with an air purifier (we didn't want to change rooms). The hotel is in an awkward location, but really did not affect us or cause us any trouble. Being right next to I-4 I didn't hear any noise, but we were on the 7th floor which may have helped. The room was very spacious which was great since we traveled with 3 adults and a toddler. I definately would stay here again...and again. O yea, extra bonus NO HIDDEN FEES!!!! No parking or resort fee was WONDERFUL!

Reviews.Title: “A+++ With excellent personal attention”
Reviews.Author: LeenenNL
Reviews.Content: At this moment we are still enjoying a 8 night stay at this hotel. At the reception they show real personal attention and just 10 minutes after checking in we received a phone call of everything is allright. Superior room is perfect for a party of 4 and all beds have a personal sleep number so you can personalize your bed settings. We will come back in december.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for theme parks - clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Vanessacmc
Reviews.Content: The choice of hotels in Orlando is staggering, and I picked this hotel purely based on previous trip advisor reviews - it was a good choice. I thought i would list a few of the benefits; - we booked online a few months before, direct with the hotel and got a great deal. - The location for Disney, Sea World, etc etc is fabulous and was the only reason for our stay. You could get closer by staying in the parks, however this will bump the price up considerably. - the check in staff were very friendly and when I asked for 2 rooms on the same floor they managed to easily accommodate this with a smile. - there is a free shuttle service to the disney theme parks - the rooms are HUGE ! 2 queen size beds, seating area, lots of storage, lots of space etc. It was definitely nice to have so much space and not feel cramped in. - there is a good selection of restaurants in the area. No need to venture far for eating - Should you get fed-up of restaurants, (which we did on a couple of nights) there is a Publix and a Winn Dixie close by, where we bought food, to cook in the microwave in the room and then kept in the spacious fridge - also in the room. - should you like gadgets, then the sleep bed is good to play around with to change the firmness of the mattress. Only slight cons - It is right by the I4 and the traffic noise does continue throughout the night. However, I asked for a room on a higher floor (only 8 floors in total), we got the 7th and it wasn't a huge issue. - Breakfast wasn't included. - The road layout outside the hotel, is not the most friendly. We drove a few blocks to find a supermarket and spent 15 mins trying to get back because of the traffic lights and lack of roads you could do a U-turn on. However these were not big issues and didn't cause any upsets. I'd certainly recommend it to anyone wanting a reasonably priced hotel in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Top notch hotel”
Reviews.Author: Superior_Sails
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful, clean hotel in a great location. We were able to quickly get to our destinations and this hotel has everything you need to make your stay comfortable and convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Immaculate hotel”
Reviews.Author: Angie4466
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel. It is very nice and clean and beautifully decorated. The rooms are very spacious and includes microwave, coffee maker and refrigerator which is a huge plus especially if you're travelling with young children. The staff is friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend this hotel. If you need a taxi service from the hotel, call Yusef at 407-914-5222. He's wonderful. My daughter got sick on our trip and had to go to the emergency room. He came to the emergency room at 5 am to pick us up. He was always on time and a genuinely nice person.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel - Clean, Classy and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: willranger
Reviews.Content: This hotel was absolutely fabulous. The sleep number beds were to die for. The hotel is beautifully appointed and absolutely spotless. Everyone is friendly and helpful. You will not go wrong in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and central location for parks”
Reviews.Author: Singbe
Reviews.Content: We booked the Radisson based on TripAdviser reviews, and were not disappointed. This hotel has lots of positives - spacious and clean rooms; refrigerator, coffee machine and microwave; sleep number beds; a nice outdoor pool area with pool bar, and loungers, towels and complimentary sunscreen sachets; free parking; free Wi-Fi internet; and not to forget the free cookies at reception! The hotel is centrally located for most of the Orlando parks and also offers a daily free bus service to Disney. As for 'Temp4rebecca' saying you can only walk as far as a dirty gift shop - don't believe it. Yes, there is a 'cheap and nasty' gift shop next to the hotel, but explore a bit further and you can walk (within a mile radius - its healthy!) to many restaurants in the vicinity, including Carrabba's, Bahama Breeze, Olive Garden, Black Angus, Outback, Rio, etc. We walked to many places, including the premium outlet shopping centre, a beautiful chapel and a local supermarket, and had a great time. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful (some more than others), but a special mention is deserved for Terry the manager, the day time reception staff, and especially our room attendant (Room 419). The hotel does have some drawbacks: The location is not ideal, next to Interstate 4, and there is some difficulty accessing or leaving, depending on your destination/approach. We had to carry out U - turns on a couple of occasions, and subsequently got pulled over by the rudest of rude Orange County Sheriffs, for a 'misdemeanor' (no one in the hotel industry could surpass this 'lady' sheriff's attitude!). My fault, but boy, never mind the hotels, sort out your cops, Florida !! The air conditioning unit was efficient, but noisy and drafty when on, and did give us a few sleepless nights until we got used to it. We also have to agree with 'girltravel10' about the misleading situation at the Guest Services Desk - the desk is run by Orange Lake Resorts, and the guest service element is minimal. Orange Lake Resorts staff focus solely on trying to sell you time shares/villas on the pretext of giving you discounted park tickets. We avoided this desk after the second day - the staff were unhelpful and only interested in 'selling' (get rid of them, Radisson, they contribute very little to the customer experience). The above said, the majority of our comments are nevertheless very positive. We booked the Radisson for two weeks, but were then stranded when the Eyjafjallajkull volcano erupted in Iceland. The reception staff were more than helpful, and worked around reservations to book us in for a further 11 nights until the flight chaos subsided. This was done at the same room rate, and with minimum of fuss - thank you. Overall, we had a very enjoyable and comfortable stay at the Radisson, and would not hesitate to return, or recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: bgbraga
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Hotel Radisson Lake Buena Vista from April 14th until April 29th. We chose the family suite, and there were 5 adults and 1 child. The room was spacious, the bed is comfortable, it has two lcd tv's in each room, and also free high speed internet access. During our stay, it was like we were home, and when we need to contact the front desk, LeAnn was very helpful and friendly. The hotel is very well located, almost in the intersection from I-4 and Apopka Vineland, close to Orlando Premium Outlets. It is close to Disney parks, Seaworld and Universal. I definately recomend this hotel to everybody. Great price!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Jacuzzi Suite!”
Reviews.Author: moreoddthaneven
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel for a trip to Orlando for our anniversary - the jacuzzi suite was excellent, loved that the rooms have microwaves and mini-fridges, the beds were excellent, rooms were very clean, all staff was wonderful to deal with. The only thing that wasn't perfect was the noise from the highway, but we were on the I-4 side of the hotel, and honestly the noise level was no worse than any other hotel I've stayed at in the past. Overall, this was a favorite! They really think of the little things, and it made for a perfect trip!

Reviews.Title: “Best Radisson I've ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Madeline34480
Reviews.Content: This Radisson was much better than the usual hotels you find in Orlando. Everyone we came in contact with was helpful and friendly and smiling. The room was excellent - welcome pack of samples, 2 cold bottles of spring water in fridge - both complimentary. We have stayed at other more expensive hotels where they nickle and dime you for everything. Our room rate was great for this hotel - we went right to their website and got the best price. We recommend this Radisson in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “5 star hotel with a 2 star price!”
Reviews.Author: aceofbase
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last year twice and are returning again in May. Great hotel with excellent facilites. The rooms are very spacious with a huge 37" flatscreen tv, microwave,refridgerator and air con, not forgetting the adjustable bed which was rather funky! I usually look for flaws in hotel as soon as i get there but could not fault anything. Make sure you grab a handful of free freshly made cookies in reception in the afternoon like i did almost everyday ;)! The hotel is in a great location, only 5 mins drive to downtown disney, or you can use the hotel free disney shuttle which i advise as parking in the Disney parks has risen to $14! Premium outlets is also only a 5 mins drive. Crossroads shopping centre is only 5 min walk from the hotel where there are restaurants and a supermarket. Can't wait to return in 2 weeks time!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel! You must go!”
Reviews.Author: ResCoordinator
Reviews.Content: The hotel is great! Just a mile from Disney, near to a lot of restaurants, supermarkets (CrossRoads) and very near from Orlando Premium Outlet. Easy access to everywhere! The room is very comfortable...the bed is amazing...staff is very friendly! You must go to this hotel...

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: Mangonboat
Reviews.Content: Selected this hotel based on positive reviews, and they were spot on! We didn't do any theme parks, but it was a great base of operations while in Orlando for 2 days. Convenient to I-4. The staff, from the front desk to the bartender to the chef in the restaurant were all genuinely up-key, friendly and competent. I was especially impressed with how sensitive they were to the European travelers stuck in Orlando because of the volcano/ash cloud over Europe. Queen -size Sleep-Number beds!

Reviews.Title: “One word - Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: randamaldonado
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean and well decorated. The room was huge! We loved the sleep number beds. The staff was very responsive and helpful. A great location, close to Downtown Disney and the theme parks. Many restaurants within walking distance. An excellent value! We had dinner at the restaurant one night and it was delicious. We will stay here again next time we come to Orlando. Loved it!

Reviews.Title: “A+”
Reviews.Author: observer2005
Reviews.Content: It is listed as a 3.5 star hotel but I would rate it a 4 star. Immaculate rooms -- clean, modern, and well appointed. Convenient location - near the highway and Disney Parks. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it, loved it, loved it”
Reviews.Author: emilyrose0912
Reviews.Content: A huge thank you to all the Trip Advisor users who took the trouble to review this hotel. It took the headache out of trying to find a good hotel for me and my young family. I flew for 9 hours with 23 month old on my lap and arrived here at 1am UK time, and what a relief. Staff all great, lovely, clean, modern hotel. Great poached eggs! Disney, Seaworld, etc all very close. Outlet Shopping, supermarket, TGIF's, Dennys, etc all minutes away and tacky gift shop which the kids loved just across the car park. Perfect!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic ,clean Hotel, comfiest beds ever,Loved it !!”
Reviews.Author: GeorgeBolton
Reviews.Content: What a great hotel , The hotel was spotlessly clean , friendly helpful staff , great washing machines and tumble dryers on the 2nd floor , i had a problem with the coins in the machine and it was sorted immediately. our room was kept very clean thanks to Rosie , clean towels daily and clean sheets every 2 days ! Our beds were so comfortable , we all slept really well, delicious buffet breakfasts , best breakfasts in orlando! Our children loved the freshly baked cookies every afternoon , lovely food , we used room service a few times , staff were very efficient, There are good hairdryers in the room a fridge and a microwave , tea & coffee great high speed internet we took our laptop , the i pod docking station and flat screen tv were also a big plus. we had a wonderful holiday and would stay here again .

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Stay”
Reviews.Author: enad14
Reviews.Content: to the management and staff,thank you very much for the service,we had a wonderful stay at the hotel that even my little girl age 5 says,i really missed radisson,i know how she fells,we were staying at room 718 for 14 nights,march 31 up to april 14 with two kids and thanks to Rosa who look after the room...also they missed the cookies every afternoon..

Reviews.Title: “Spring Break”
Reviews.Author: 5ks
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Radisson for spring break this year and loved it! Our room was immaculate (thanks to our maid, Rosie). The hotel was a great value and close to everything. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel at a great value!”
Reviews.Author: Theniffny
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I take a Halloween trip to Orlando each year to have some spooky fun at all the local attractions, so we have stayed at a lot of hotels over the years and I am most satisfied with this one! It was clean, the staff was very helpful and friendly, it was right around the corner from EVERYTHING, and the price was right! I've paid the same amount of money for a Disney value resort with great landscaping, but the rooms were very basic; at this Radisson I got a Jacuzzi in the room, king size sleep number bed, flat screen TV with pay channels, mini fridge, coffee maker, and microwave! Bottom line, you can get a more posh place for twice the money, but at this price marker the Radisson Lake Buena Vista will wow you!

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Bobman00
Reviews.Content: The hotel in one word. Clean! This hotel sparkels. The marble style floors, the mirrored surfaces, the granite countertops all meticulously clean. Not just in the room but throughout the hotel and pool area. We were both impressed. Our room was spacious, quiet and comfortable. The beds were sleep number as advertised. The bathroom was large with up to date fixtures. The shower had great water pressure with plenty of hot water. The staff courteous and helpful. The cookies fresh and delicious. The Radisson at Lake Buena Vista is one of the nicest Hotels i have stayed in. I would not hesitate to recommend them to friends or family. P.S. We avoided the guest services desk. It is inviting but we understand the time share pitch. They are everywhere. Please know that to my knowledge Disney does not discount. If you purchase tickets anywhere other than the main gate or AAA there will be a hitch of some sort. Most likely a resort or timeshare pitch. Thanks for the heads up trip advisor. Sincerely; Bob B. Lowell, MA

Reviews.Title: “large, super clean rooms with excellent hospitality and location”
Reviews.Author: scampalberta
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 3 nights before going on a cruise. Beautiful rooms and huge.Our group of 9 were surprised with the price for how nice everything was. We ate at their restaurant one night. Everyone enjoyed it. I had halibut,others ate pasta and pizza. The chef even came over to talk to us. There were many other resteraunts within walking distance. A hugeoutlet mall is located across the highway. The disney parks driving distance away. The best part of this hotel was how the staff went out of their way when my mom got very sick with the stomach flu. The restaurant made her chicken soup even thogh it was not on the menu. They were amazing to her. We all highly reccommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous value, customer service and lovely rooms”
Reviews.Author: eveyc
Reviews.Content: I was very pleasantly surprised when I arrived at the hotel and found a wonderful room--competitive with some of the nicest 4 star hotels I've visited for business or pleasure. The rate was great and value outstanding--free easy to use wifi, inviting queen sleep number beds with crisp linens, a wonderful desk and sofa, and a modern well lit bathroom with great soaps and plenty of shelves. The restaurant staff seemed very interested that everything ordered both at breakfast and dinner met expectations--the chef came out twice to say hi and check on satisfaction. A Starbucks seri\ving staff at the lobby bar provided a quick breakfast when I had 10 minutes to run to my conference. The only inconvenience is that I couldn't walk to my meetings--would have had to cross the highway--possible but not so appealing. For families on vacation, this is a good spot as there are plenty of moderate and lower priced restaurants nearby and downtown Disney is also just a mile down the road. High marks for the cleanliness of rooms and bathrooms, friendliness of front desk and concierge staff, and nice woman who runs the car rental office. I'd return to this hotel and recommend it for amazing value and a very comfortable stay. I travel to many conferences and stay at lots of hotels in the US and internationally--Radisson is doing something right in training their staff to be customer focused. I've never written a hotel review but felt compelled. The price was right as was the comfy room at the end of the day.

Reviews.Title: “Worth your stay”
Reviews.Author: Frugalvalen
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel when it was Days Inn, by far, this hotel exceeded my expectations. The friendliness of the staff, seems to be pretty well trained and their knowledge regarding the area was excellent. Now the name is Radisson Hotel, this goes way above and beyond my expectations. Their Staff goes above and beyond the call of duty. Their renovations is a piece of art. It is worth your money staying at this hotel and by far, the best in the area. You are within walking distance of Downtown Disney, Outlet, Supermarket and restaurants. I will recommend this hotel to those traveling to Florida. It is worth your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay on vacation”
Reviews.Author: Jennettemh
Reviews.Content: The Radisson was wonderful! Is close o Disney attractions and offers shuttle service. Also convenient to lots of restaurants. Staff was friendly and courteous and the rooms were very nice and clean. I would stay here again when visiting Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Harassed by salesman at what we thought was a concierge desk”
Reviews.Author: girltravel10
Reviews.Content: Nice ,clean rooms but we had a very unpleasant interaction with a salesman in the main lobby at a desk we assumed was concierge. We simpy asked for some directions and had a difficult time refusing a sales pitch for what I assume were time shares. The young man was rude and aggresive when we politely declined his offer for "tickets". I would not recommend this hotel and feel the hotel should have some notification displayed at the desk of their intention of sales so that the unsuspecting traveler doesn't wander innocently into the store.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent all around”
Reviews.Author: Juan57
Reviews.Content: After 10 days family holiday (Disney and Miami) in other hotels stayed there a week with my daughter on business for a trade show.Already had checked ratings on Trip Advisor and a friend who stayed before highly recommended it.This hotel caters for everyone,if on holiday the fridge and microwave are great and if on business that plus free internet is even better.The beds are incredible you can regulate them soft or hard on each side! Excellent location also.If I would have to add a comment and be choosy I would say a if the outdoor pool could be heated.Will sure be back next year for a week.

Reviews.Title: “The service of a 5 star without the price”
Reviews.Author: Mizzzz
Reviews.Content: My son was getting married in Orlando and I needed to find a hotel that was reasonably affordable for all the guests. Having stayed at many 5 star hotels for business travel, I was a little apprehensive about staying here. The Radisson - Lake Buena Vista definitely exceeded my expectations. The hotel was one of the cleanest hotels I have ever visited. The rooms were nicely decorated and furnished with a refrigerator and microwave. Most of all, the employees actually behaved as if they enjoyed working for their company and having you as a guest.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: SoFlaHarley
Reviews.Content: I wanted to choose a hotel in the vicinity of the downtown Disney area and this hotel was on a few that still had rooms available. After reading the reviews, I made my reservation and was pleasantly surprised. My opinion is that this hotel is more geared to business travelers than families. There is no game room or other activities for kids. There is a workout room albeit a small one. The lobby itself has a sitting area with TV and there is a restaurant and a little bar type area as well. Overall the entrance area to the hotel is small compared to other hotels in downtown Disney area. I reserved a room which had two select comfort queen sized beds, a work desk and couch. The room also had a good sized HDTV as well as a fridge and microwave. The room was very clean and the bathroom was a good size. The room I had overlooked the souvenier store which is located in the same area. I didn't mind that at all. I didn't use the pool at all but it looked like a decent size. Even if I wanted to use it. The first day I was there it rained all day and the other 2 days it was a little cool for swimming. (Maybe not for some tourists from the north) The only complaint I have is not the fault of the hotel. You can only come into the hotel if you're heading west on Apopka-Vineland Rd from I-4. If you're coming from downtown disney you'd have to head east past the hotel, make a U-turn and head west just to get to the hotel. This became a problem around 5pm and beyond when people are heading from the parks or out to dinner. The traffic was so heavy it would take you a good 45 minutes to get to the hotel from Downtown Disney when it should only take you 5 minutes. My suggestion is if you're leaving the parks or downtown disney, jump on I-4 and get off at the SR 535 exit and head west. That way you'll be heading in the right direction. You'll still may have to wait in traffic, but not as long.

Reviews.Title: “Staff Were Excellent - Rooms Were Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: EtoileBrilliant
Reviews.Content: Booked through company website to get best rate. Am a big fan of SAS Radisson in Europe so was interested to find out what the US chain was like. Was not disappointed in the slightest. Standard twin slept 2 adults and 4 children without any problem thanks to sofa bed. It was spotless and of very high quality (I am a a regular business traveller). Bathroom was small but we are a big family. Breakfast buffet is top notch, kids under 6 go free. Wifi was patchy on 4th floor. Pool was clean little cold (but so was weather). Staff were excellent in too numerous ways to list (e.g. recovered lost stroller from car park) On exit 68 which is one exit from Magic Kingdom. Near Premium Outlets and several good family restaurants. Would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: China2002
Reviews.Content: In all my years of travel I have never been treated so rudely by customer service as I was at Radisson. I will never book a Radisson hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for trip to WDW”
Reviews.Author: Jay71
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Radisson during a trip to WDW in Dec 2009 and have only now gotten around to write this review. We’re regular value travelers doing the odd splurge; married, no kids; in our thirties. The Radisson is likely one the best value hotels you’ll find for a trip to DisneyWorld because of the right combination of price, location, and useful complementary amenities. We lucked out and won this hotel stay via Priceline but would in future book this hotel directly to ensure we stayed here. Location The location of the hotel was excellent. We rented a car from the airport and were able to easily find our way to the hotel. It was a relatively short drive and the few tolls were not very expensive. There was lots of free parking at the hotel and we never were left without a spot even when we came back late. [Free parking was a big plus because the other properties we were looking at (eg. DT Disney Hilton, etc) charged crazy daily rates for parking.] There’s easy access on and off Hwy 4. The only quirk is that because there’s a median dividing N/S, if you want to travel south, the quickest way was to zip across the northbound lanes to a left turn bay (for the Chevron) and pull a U-turn. Beside the hotel is a low-end souvenir shop. [Didn’t find anything good in there but you might as well visit it since it’s right there.] Across the street is a Chevron. Do NOT buy gas here as it is way overpriced. North along the street for many blocks were A LOT of dining options both unique restaurants and more familiar chains.
